char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch)) ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch)) ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return ans;}namespace modular { const int mod=998244353; inline int add(int a,int b) { return a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod; } inline int dec(int a,int b) { return a<b?a-b+mod:a-b; } inline int mul(int a,int b) { return (ll)a*b%mod; } inline void Add(int&a,int b) { a=a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod; } inline void Dec(int&a,int b) { a=a<b?a-b+mod:a-b; } inline void Mul(int&a,int b) { a=(ll)a*b%mod; } inline int ksm(int a,int p) { int ret=1;for(;p;p>>=1,Mul(a,a)) (p&1)&&(Mul(ret,a),1);return ret; } inline int Inv(int a) { return ksm(a,mod-2); } inline int fix(int a) { return (a%mod+mod)%mod; }}using namespace modular;template<typename T> inline void ckmin(T&a,T b) { a>b?a=b:0; }template<typename T> inline void ckmax(T&a,T b) { a<b?a=b:0; }const int N=1005;int n,m,A,seg[N],sz,vl[N],sig,a[N];struct Q { int l,r,v; friend inline bool operator<(Q a,Q b) { return a.v^b.v?a.v<b.v:(a.l^b.l?a.l<b.l:a.r<b.r); }}qry[N];inline int findps(int x) { return lower_bound(seg+1,seg+sig+1,x)-seg; }inline int findvl(int x) { return lower_bound(vl+1,vl+sz+1,x)-vl; }inline int calc(int w) { vector<int>upd,psl,f[2]; int cur=0; upd.pb(0),f[0].pb(0),f[1].pb(0),psl.pb(0); for(ri i=1;i<sig;++i) if(a[i]==w) upd.pb(i),psl.pb(0),f[0].pb(0),f[1].pb(0); for(ri l,r,i=1;i<=m;++i) if(qry[i].v==w) { if(upd.size()==1) return 0; l=lower_bound(upd.begin(),upd.end(),qry[i].l)-upd.begin(); r=lower_bound(upd.begin(),upd.end(),qry[i].r)-upd.begin()-1; ckmax(psl[r],l); } f[cur=0][0]=1; for(ri i=1,s,c1,c2,up=(int)upd.size()-1;i<=up;++i) { cur^=1; for(ri j=0;j<=i;++j) f[cur][j]=0; c1=ksm(vl[w],seg[upd[i]+1]-seg[upd[i]]),c2=ksm(vl[w]-1,seg[upd[i]+1]-seg[upd[i]]); s=0; for(ri j=psl[i];j<i;++j) if(f[cur^1][j]) Add(f[cur][j],mul(f[cur^1][j],c2)); for(ri j=0;j<i;++j) if(f[cur^1][j]) Add(s,f[cur^1][j]); f[cur][i]=mul(dec(c1,c2),s); } int res=0; for(ri i=0,up=(int)upd.size()-1;i<=up;++i) Add(res,f[cur][i]); return res;}int main() { #ifdef ldxcaicai freopen("lx.in","r",stdin); #endif for(ri tt=read();tt;--tt) { n=read(),m=read(),A=read(); sig=sz=0; for(ri i=1;i<=m;++i) { qry[i].l=read(),qry[i].r=read()+1,qry[i].v=read(); seg[++sig]=qry[i].l,seg[++sig]=qry[i].r,vl[++sz]=qry[i].v; } seg[++sig]=1,seg[++sig]=n+1; sort(seg+1,seg+sig+1),sig=unique(seg+1,seg+sig+1)-seg-1; sort(vl+1,vl+sz+1),sz=unique(vl+1,vl+sz+1)-vl-1; for(ri i=1;i<=sig;++i) a[i]=sz+1; sort(qry+1,qry+m+1); for(ri i=1;i<=m;++i) { qry[i].l=findps(qry[i].l); qry[i].r=findps(qry[i].r); qry[i].v=findvl(qry[i].v); for(ri j=qry[i].l;j<qry[i].r;++j) ckmin(a[j],qry[i].v); } int res=1,ss=0; for(ri i=1;i<=sz;++i) { Mul(res,calc(i)); if(!res) break; } if(!res ) { puts("0");continue; } for(ri i=1;i<sig;++i) if(a[i]==sz+1) ss+=seg[i+1]-seg[i]; cout<<mul(res,ksm(A,ss))<<'\n'; } return 0;} ä¹ä¸ªå¤ªé˜³è§£é¢˜æ€è·¯ ~~å•ä½æ ¹åæ¼”è£¸é¢˜ï¼Œä¸ç”¨å†™é¢˜è§£äº†~~ å¥½å§è¿˜æ˜¯æ°´ä¸€å‘é¢˜è§£å§ã€‚ $$ \begin{aligned} Ans=&\sum\limits_{i=0}^n(\sum\limits_{j=0}^{K-1}\omega_K^{ij})\binom ni\\ =&\sum\limits_{i=0}^{K-1}\sum\limits_{j=0}^n\omega_K^{ij}\binom nj\\ =&\sum\limits_{i=0}^{K-1}(\omega_K^i+1)^n \end{aligned} $$ CODE 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031#include<bits/stdc++.h>#define ri register intusing namespace std;typedef long long ll;namespace modular { const int mod=998244353; inline int add(int a,int b) { return a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod; } inline int dec(int a,int b) { return a<b?a-b+mod:a-b; } inline int mul(int a,int b) { return (ll)a*b%mod; } inline void Add(int&a,int b) { a=a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod; } inline void Dec(int&a,int b) { a=a<b?a-b+mod:a-b; } inline void Mul(int&a,int b) { a=(ll)a*b%mod; } inline int ksm(int a,int p) { int ret=1;for(;p;p>>=1,Mul(a,a)) (p&1)&&(Mul(ret,a),1);return ret; } inline int Inv(int a) { return ksm(a,mod-2); } inline int fix(int a) { return (a%mod+mod)%mod; }}using namespace modular;ll n;int K,omega;int main() { #ifdef ldxcaicai freopen("lx.in","r",stdin); #endif cin>>n>>K; n%=mod-1; omega=ksm(3,(mod-1)/K); int res=0; for(ri i=0,mt=1;i<K;++i,Mul(mt,omega)) Add(res,ksm(mt+1,n)); cout<<mul(res,Inv(K)); return 0;} Hard Nimè§£é¢˜æ€è·¯ è€ƒè™‘åˆ°é—®é¢˜è½¬åŒ–ä¸ºæ±‚å¼‚æˆ–å€¼ä¸º $0$ çš„æ–¹æ¡ˆæ•°ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆå¯¹äºæ¯å †çŸ³å­å¯ä»¥é€‰å–çš„é›†åˆä¸ºä¸è¶…è¿‡ $m$ çš„ç´ æ•°é›†åˆï¼Œå‘ç°å°±æ˜¯ä¸ª $fwt$ å¿«é€Ÿå¹‚ CODE 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647484950515253545556#include<bits/stdc++.h>#define ri register intusing namespace std;typedef long long ll;namespace modular { const int mod=1e9+7; inline int add(int a,int b) { return a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod; } inline int dec(int a,int b) { return a<b?a-b+mod:a-b; } inline int mul(int a,int b) { return (ll)a*b%mod; } inline void Add(int&a,int b) { a=a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod; } inline void Dec(int&a,int b) { a=a<b?a-b+mod:a-b; } inline void Mul(int&a,int b) { a=(ll)a*b%mod; } inline int ksm(int a,int p) { int ret=1;for(;p;p>>=1,Mul(a,a)) (p&1)&&(Mul(ret,a),1);return ret; } inline int Inv(int a) { return ksm(a,mod-2); } inline int fix(int a) { return (a%mod+mod)%mod; }}using namespace modular;const int N=50005;int n,m,pri[N],tot=0,a[N<<1];bool vs[N];inline void init() { int up=50000; for(ri i=2;i<=up;++i) { if(!vs[i]) pri[++tot]=i; for(ri j=1,lm=up/i;j<=tot&&pri[j]<=lm;++j) { vs[i*pri[j]]=1; if(i==i/pri[j]*pri[j]) break; } }}int lim;inline void fwt(int*a,int typ) { for(ri i=1,a0,a1,iv=mod+1>>1;i<lim;i<<=1) for(ri j=0,len=i<<1;j<lim;j+=len) for(ri k=0;k<i;++k) { a0=a[j+k],a1=a[j+k+i]; a[j+k]=add(a0,a1),a[j+k+i]=dec(a0,a1); if(typ==-1) Mul(a[j+k],iv),Mul(a[j+k+i],iv); }}int main() { #ifdef ldxcaicai freopen("lx.in","r",stdin); #endif init(); while(cin>>n>>m) { lim=1; while(lim<=m) lim<<=1; for(ri i=0;i<lim;++i) a[i]=0; for(ri i=1;i<=tot&&pri[i]<=m;++i) a[pri[i]]=1; fwt(a,1); for(ri i=0;i<lim;++i) a[i]=ksm(a[i],n); fwt(a,-1); cout<<a[0]<<'\n'; } return 0;} äºŒå…ƒè¿ç®—è§£é¢˜æ€è·¯ é¢˜ç›®ç»™å‡ºäº†ä¸¤ç§åŸºç¡€å·ç§¯æ–¹å¼ï¼Œå‘ç°åˆšå¥½æ˜¯ $x1,j>1)$ çš„ç³»æ•°æ˜¯ $\binom{n+n-i-j}{n-i}a^{n-j}b^{n-i}$ ï¼Œæ ¼å­ $(1,i>1)$ çš„ç³»æ•°æ˜¯ $\binom{n+n-2-i}{n-2}a^{n-i}b^{n-1}$ ï¼Œæ ¼å­ $(i>1,1)$ çš„ç³»æ•°æ˜¯ $\binom{n+n-2-i}{n-2}a^{n-1}b^{n-i}$ ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆæ˜¾ç„¶ $$ \begin{aligned} Ans=&\sum\limits_{i=2}^nf_{1,i}\binom{n+n-2-i}{n-2}a^{n-i}b^{n-1}+\sum\limits_{i=2}^nf_{i,1}\binom{n+n-2-i}{n-2}a^{n-1}b^{n-i}+\sum\limits_{i=2}^n\sum\limits_{j=2}^nc\binom{n+n-i-j}{n-i}a^{n-j}b^{n-i} \end{aligned} $$ å‘ç°å‰é¢çš„å¯ä»¥ $O(n)$ ç®—åé¢çš„å¯ä»¥å·ç§¯ç®—ï¼Œå¤æ‚åº¦ $O(n\log n)$ ~~å…¶å®åé¢çš„å¼å­å¯ä»¥ç”¨ç»„åˆæ•°æ¨å‡ºO(n)çš„å¼å­ä½†ç”±äºæˆ‘å¤ªæ‡’äº†å°±ä¸å†™äº†ï¼Œå¯ä»¥å‚è§å®˜æ–¹é¢˜è§£~~ CODE #include<bits/stdc++.h>#define ri register intusing namespace std;typedef long long ll;const int rlen=1<<18|1;char buf[rlen],*ib=buf,*ob=buf;#define gc() (((ib==ob)&&(ob=(ib=buf)+fread(buf,1,rlen,stdin)),ib==ob)?-1:*ib++)inline int read() { int ans=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch)) ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch)) ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return ans;}struct cp { double x,y; cp(double x=0,double y=0):x(x),y(y) {} friend inline cp operator+(cp a,cp b) { return cp(a.x+b.x,a.y+b.y); } friend inline void operator+=(cp&a,cp b) { a=a+b; } friend inline cp operator-(cp a,cp b) { return cp(a.x-b.x,a.y-b.y); } friend inline void operator-=(cp&a,cp b) { a=a-b; } friend inline cp operator*(cp a,cp b) { return cp(a.x*b.x-a.y*b.y,a.x*b.y+a.y*b.x); } friend inline void operator*=(cp&a,cp b) { a=a*b; } friend inline cp operator*(cp a,double b) { return cp(a.x*b,a.y*b); } friend inline void operator*=(cp&a,double b) { a=a*b; } friend inline cp operator/(cp a,double b) { return cp(a.x/b,a.y/b); } friend inline void operator/=(cp&a,double b) { a=a/b; } inline cp operator~() const { return cp(x,-y); }};typedef vector<cp> poly;const double pi=acos(-1.0);int lim,tim;vector<cp> w[20];vector<int>rev[20];inline void init_fft() { w[19].resize(1<<19); for(ri i=0,lm=1<<19;i<lm;++i) w[19][i]=cp(cos(pi/lm*i),sin(pi/lm*i)); for(ri i=18;~i;--i) { w[i].resize(1<<i); for(ri j=0,up=1<<i;j<up;++j) w[i][j]=w[i+1][j<<1]; }}inline void init(int up) { lim=1,tim=0; while(lim<up) lim<<=1,++tim; if(rev[tim].size()) return; rev[tim].resize(lim); for(ri i=1;i<lim;++i) rev[tim][i]=(rev[tim][i>>1]>>1)|((i&1)<<(tim-1));}inline void fft(poly&a,int typ) { for(ri i=1;i<lim;++i) if(i<rev[tim][i]) swap(a[i],a[rev[tim][i]]); cp a0,a1; for(ri i=1,t=0;i<lim;i<<=1,++t) for(ri j=0,len=i<<1;j<lim;j+=len) { for(ri k=0;k<i;++k) { a0=a[j+k],a1=a[j+k+i]*w[t][k]; a[j+k]=a0+a1,a[j+k+i]=a0-a1; } } if(~typ) return; reverse(++a.begin(),a.end()); for(ri i=0;i<lim;++i) a[i]/=lim;}namespace modular { const int mod=1e6+3; inline int add(int a,int b) { return a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod; } inline int dec(int a,int b) { return a<b?a-b+mod:a-b; } inline int mul(int a,int b) { return (ll)a*b%mod; } inline void Add(int&a,int b) { a=a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod; } inline void Dec(int&a,int b) { a=a<b?a-b+mod:a-b; } inline void Mul(int&a,int b) { a=(ll)a*b%mod; } inline int ksm(int a,int p) { int ret=1;for(;p;p>>=1,Mul(a,a)) (p&1)&&(Mul(ret,a),1);return ret; } inline int Inv(int a) { return ksm(a,mod-2); }}using namespace modular;const int N=4e5+5,blo=1023;inline int poly_mul(int*a,int*b,int n,int m,int*c) { int t=n+m-1; init(t); poly A(lim),B(lim),P(lim),Q(lim); for(ri i=0;i<n;++i) A[i]=cp(a[i]>>10,a[i]&blo); for(ri i=0;i<m;++i) B[i]=cp(b[i]>>10,b[i]&blo); fft(A,1),fft(B,1); cp cur[4]; for(ri i=0,j=0;i<lim;++i,j=j?j-1:lim-1) { cur[0]=(A[i]+(~A[j]))*cp(0.5,0); cur[1]=((~A[j])-A[i])*cp(0,0.5); cur[2]=(B[i]+(~B[j]))*cp(0.5,0); cur[3]=((~B[j])-B[i])*cp(0,0.5); P[i]=cur[0]*cur[2]+cp(0,1)*cur[1]*cur[3]; Q[i]=cur[0]*cur[3]+cp(0,1)*cur[1]*cur[2]; } fft(P,-1),fft(Q,-1); ll cr[4]; for(ri i=0;i<t;++i) { cr[0]=(ll)(P[i].x+0.5)%mod; cr[1]=(ll)(P[i].y+0.5)%mod; cr[2]=(ll)(Q[i].x+0.5)%mod; cr[3]=(ll)(Q[i].y+0.5)%mod; c[i]=((cr[0]<<20)+(cr[2]+cr[3]<<10)+cr[1])%mod; } return t;}int n,c,vl1[N>>1],vl2[N>>1],fac[N],ifac[N],pwa[N>>1],pwb[N>>1];inline void init() { int up=n<<1; fac[0]=fac[1]=ifac[0]=ifac[1]=1; for(ri i=2;i<=up;++i) { fac[i]=mul(fac[i-1],i); ifac[i]=mul(ifac[mod-mod/i*i],mod-mod/i); } for(ri i=2;i<=up;++i) Mul(ifac[i],ifac[i-1]);}inline int C(int n,int m) { return n<m||m<0?0:(ll)fac[n]*ifac[m]*ifac[n-m]%mod; }int F[N>>1],G[N>>1],H[N],len;int main() { #ifdef ldxcaicai freopen("lx.in","r",stdin); #endif init_fft(); pwa[0]=pwb[0]=1; n=read(),pwa[1]=read(),pwb[1]=read(),c=read(); init(); for(ri i=2;i<=n;++i) pwa[i]=mul(pwa[i-1],pwa[1]),pwb[i]=mul(pwb[i-1],pwb[1]); for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i) vl1[i]=read(); for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i) vl2[i]=read(); int res=0; for(ri i=2;i<=n;++i) { Add(res,mul(mul(vl1[i],C((n<<1)-2-i,n-2)),mul(pwa[n-1],pwb[n-i]))); Add(res,mul(mul(vl2[i],C((n<<1)-2-i,n-2)),mul(pwb[n-1],pwa[n-i]))); } for(ri i=0;i<n-1;++i) F[i]=mul(ifac[i],pwa[i]),G[i]=mul(ifac[i],pwb[i]); len=poly_mul(F,G,n-1,n-1,H); for(ri i=0;i<len;++i) Add(res,mul(mul(c,fac[i]),H[i])); cout<<res; return 0;}

char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch)) ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch)) ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return ans;}namespace modular { const int mod=998244353; inline int add(int a,int b) { return a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod; } inline int dec(int a,int b) { return a<b?a-b+mod:a-b; } inline int mul(int a,int b) { return (ll)a*b%mod; } inline void Add(int&a,int b) { a=a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod; } inline void Dec(int&a,int b) { a=a<b?a-b+mod:a-b; } inline void Mul(int&a,int b) { a=(ll)a*b%mod; } inline int ksm(int a,int p) { int ret=1;for(;p;p>>=1,Mul(a,a)) (p&1)&&(Mul(ret,a),1);return ret; } inline int Inv(int a) { return ksm(a,mod-2); }}using namespace modular;const int N=1e6+5;int lim,n,X,Y,Z,vl[4],a[N],b[N],c[N];inline void dwt(int*a,int typ) { for(ri i=1,a0,a1,iv=mod+1>>1;i<lim;i<<=1)for(ri j=0,len=i<<1;j<lim;j+=len) for(ri k=0;k<i;++k) { a0=a[j+k],a1=a[j+k+i]; a[j+k]=add(a0,a1),a[j+k+i]=dec(a0,a1); if(typ==-1) Mul(a[j+k],iv),Mul(a[j+k+i],iv); }}int main() { #ifdef ldxcaicai freopen("lx.in","r",stdin); #endif n=read(),lim=1<<read(); X=read(),Y=read(),Z=read(); int ss=0; for(ri i=1,_a,_b,_c;i<=n;++i) { _a=read(),_b=read()^_a,_c=read()^_a; ss^=_a; ++a[_b^_c],++b[_b],++c[_c]; } dwt(a,1),dwt(b,1),dwt(c,1); vl[0]=add(X,add(Y,Z)); vl[1]=add(X,dec(Y,Z)); vl[2]=add(X,dec(Z,Y)); vl[3]=dec(X,add(Y,Z)); for(ri iv=Inv(4),x,y,z,w,i=0;i<lim;++i) { x=mul(iv,add(add(n,a[i]),add(b[i],c[i]))); y=mul(iv,dec(add(n,b[i]),add(c[i],a[i]))); z=mul(iv,dec(add(n,c[i]),add(b[i],a[i]))); w=mul(iv,dec(add(n,a[i]),add(b[i],c[i]))); a[i]=mul(mul(ksm(vl[0],x),ksm(vl[1],y)),mul(ksm(vl[2],z),ksm(vl[3],w))); } dwt(a,-1); for(ri i=0;i<lim;++i) cout<<a[i^ss]<<' '; return 0;} å° Y çš„èƒŒåŒ…è®¡æ•°é—®é¢˜è§£é¢˜æ€è·¯ï¼š å¯¹äºç¬¬ $i$ ç§ç‰©å“ï¼Œå¦‚æœæŒ‰ç…§æ¨¡ $i$ çš„ä½™æ•°è®°å½•å‰ç¼€å’ŒåšèƒŒåŒ… $DP$ çš„è¯å¤æ‚åº¦æ˜¯ $O(ni)$ çš„ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆè€ƒè™‘å¯¹å‰ $K$ ç§ç‰©å“æŒ‰ç…§ä¸Šè¿°åšæ³•è¿›è¡ŒèƒŒåŒ…ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆåé¢çš„ç‰©å“æœ€å¤šèƒ½é€‰ $\frac nK$ ä¸ªï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥è€ƒè™‘å¦‚ä¸‹ $DP$ ï¼Œè®¾åé¢æ‰€æœ‰ç‰©å“ä¸€å…±é€‰äº† $i$ ä¸ªï¼Œæ€»å’Œä¸º $j$ çš„æ–¹æ¡ˆæ•°ï¼Œå¯¹äºè½¬ç§»ä½œå¦‚ä¸‹è€ƒè™‘ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬æƒ³è±¡è¿™ $i$ ä¸ªç‰©å“æ’å¥½åºæ”¾åœ¨ä¸€ä¸ªåºåˆ—ä¸Šï¼Œç°åœ¨æœ‰ä¸¤ç§æ“ä½œï¼š 1. åœ¨é˜Ÿé¦–æ’å…¥ä¸€ä¸ªå¤§å°ä¸º $K+1$ çš„ç‰©å“ 2. ç»™å½“å‰æ‰€æœ‰ç‰©å“æƒå€¼+1 è¿™æ ·èƒ½åšåˆ°ä¸é‡ä¸æ¼ï¼Œå¤æ‚åº¦ä¸º $O(\frac{n^2}K)$ ï¼Œå› æ­¤ $K$ å– $\sqrt n$ æ—¶æœ€ä¼˜ CODE 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647484950515253545556#include<bits/stdc++.h>#define ri register intusing namespace std;typedef long long ll;const int rlen=1<<18|1;char buf[rlen],*ib=buf,*ob=buf;#define gc() (((ib==ob)&&(ob=(ib=buf)+fread(buf,1,rlen,stdin)),ib==ob)?-1:*ib++)inline int read() { int ans=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch)) ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch)) ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return ans;}namespace modular { const int mod=23333333; inline int add(int a,int b) { return a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod; } inline int dec(int a,int b) { return a<b?a-b+mod:a-b; } inline int mul(int a,int b) { return (ll)a*b%mod; } inline void Add(int&a,int b) { a=a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod; } inline void Dec(int&a,int b) { a=a<b?a-b+mod:a-b; } inline void Mul(int&a,int b) { a=(ll)a*b%mod; } inline int ksm(int a,int p) { int ret=1;for(;p;p>>=1,Mul(a,a)) (p&1)&&(Mul(ret,a),1);return ret; } inline int Inv(int a) { return ksm(a,mod-2); }}using namespace modular;const int N=1e5+5;int f[2][N],cur,g[350][N],n,sum[350],ss[N];int main() { #ifdef ldxcaicai freopen("lx.in","r",stdin); #endif n=read(); f[cur=0][0]=1; int res=0,sig=sqrt(n); for(ri x,id=1;id<=sig;++id) { x=id*id; cur^=1; for(ri i=0;i<id;++i) sum[i]=0; for(ri i=0,t=0;i<=n;++i,t=t==id-1?0:t+1) { Add(sum[t],f[cur^1][i]); char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch)) ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch)) ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return ans;}const int N=1e5+5;int phi[N],pri[N>>2],tot=0,n;bool vs[N],vis[N];vector<int>divv[N],Phi[N];inline void init() { phi[1]=1; for(ri i=2;i<=100000;++i) { if(!vs[i]) { pri[++tot]=i,phi[i]=i-1; for(ri j=i;j<=100000;j+=i) divv[j].pb(i); } for(ri j=1,up=100000/i;j<=tot&&pri[j]<=up;++j) { vs[i*pri[j]]=1; if(i==i/pri[j]*pri[j]) { phi[i*pri[j]]=phi[i]*pri[j];break; } phi[i*pri[j]]=phi[i]*(pri[j]-1); } }}inline bool cmp(int a,int b) { if(phi[a]^phi[b]) return phi[a]<phi[b]; for(ri i=phi[a];~i;--i) if(Phi[a][i]^Phi[b][i]) return Phi[a][i]<Phi[b][i]; return 1;}int main() { #ifdef ldxcaicai freopen("lx.in","r",stdin); #endif init(); for(ri tt=read();tt;--tt) { n=read(); vector<int>id; for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i) if(n==n/i*i) { id.pb(i); if(vis[i]) continue; vis[i]=1; Phi[i].resize(phi[i]+1); Phi[i][0]=i>1?1:-1; for(ri ct,x,s=0,lm=(int)divv[i].size();s<(1<<lm);++s) { ct=0,x=i; for(ri j=0;j<lm;++j) if(s>>j&1) ct^=1,x/=divv[i][j]; if(!ct) for(ri j=phi[i];j>=x;--j) Phi[i][j]-=Phi[i][j-x]; else for(ri j=x;j<=phi[i];++j) Phi[i][j]+=Phi[i][j-x]; } } sort(id.begin(),id.end(),cmp); for(ri i=0,x;i<(int)id.size();++i) { putchar('('); x=id[i]; for(ri j=phi[x];~j;--j) { if(!Phi[x][j]) continue; if(Phi[x][j]>0&&j!=phi[x]) putchar('+'); if(j&&Phi[x][j]==-1) putchar('-'); if(!j||Phi[x][j]>1||Phi[x][j]<-1) cout<<Phi[x][j]; if(j) putchar('x'); if(j>1) putchar('^'),cout<<j; } putchar(')'); } puts(""); } return 0;}

bool f=1; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch))f^=ch=='-',ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch))ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return f?ans:-ans;}namespace modular{ const int mod=998244353; inline int add(int a,int b){return a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod;} inline int dec(int a,int b){return a<b?a-b+mod:a-b;} inline int mul(int a,int b){return (ll)a*b%mod;} inline void Add(int&a,int b){a=a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod;} inline void Dec(int&a,int b){a=a<b?a-b+mod:a-b;} inline void Mul(int&a,int b){a=(ll)a*b%mod;} inline int ksm(int a,int p){int ret=1;for(;p;p>>=1,Mul(a,a))(p&1)&&(Mul(ret,a),1);return ret;} inline int fix(int a){return (a%mod+mod)%mod;}}using namespace modular;const int N=1e5+5;map<pii,bool>vs;map<int,ppp>F;map<pii,pii>mn_mx;vector<pii>ps;int n,m,K,res=0;inline void DP(int x,int y){ if(F.count(x-y))Add(res,mul(dec(F[x-y].fi,x),fix(F[x-y].se.fi))); F[x-y]=ppp(x,mn_mx[pii(x,y)]);}inline pii calc(int x,int y){return F.count(x-y)?F[x-y].se:pii(0,0);}int main(){ #ifdef ldxcaicai freopen("lx.in","r",stdin); #endif n=read(),m=read(),K=read(); for(ri x,y,v,i=1;i<=K;++i){ x=read(),y=read(),v=read(); posts.text: å‰è¨€ï¼šç”±äºåšä¸»æ—¶ä¸æ—¶ä¼šå¿˜è®°è¿™ä¸ªå®šç†ä»¥åŠå®ƒæ˜¯å’‹è¯æ˜çš„ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ä¸ºäº†æ–¹ä¾¿å°±å¹²è„†è‡ªå·±å†™ä¸€ä¸ªæ”¾ $blog$ ä¸Šé¢ ç°åœ¨ç»™å‡ºé›†åˆ $\text{X}$ ï¼Œè®¾ $\text G$ æ˜¯å…¶ç½®æ¢ç¾¤ï¼Œ $\text C$ æ˜¯å…¶ç€è‰²é›†ï¼Œä¸” $\text G$ ä½œç”¨åœ¨ $\text C$ ä¸‹ é‚£ä¹ˆå®šä¹‰ $G(c)=\{f:f\in \text G,f\times c=c\},C(f)=\{c:c\in \text C,f\times c=c\}$ ç„¶åæœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªæ˜¾ç„¶çš„æ¨è®º: è®¾ $c$ æ˜¯ $\text C$ ä¸­çš„ä¸€ç§ç€è‰²ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆ $|\{f\times c:f\in \text G\}|=\frac{|\text G|}{|G(c)|}$ ,è¯æ˜æ˜¾ç„¶ ç„¶åå°±èƒ½è¯æ˜ $Burnside$ å¼•ç†äº†ï¼š \begin{aligned} \sum\limits_{f\in \text G}|C(f)|=&\sum\limits_{c\in \text C}|G(c)|\\ \sum\limits_{f\in \text G}|C(f)|=&\sum\limits_{c\in\text C}\frac{|\text G|}{ä¸cç­‰ä»·çš„ç€è‰²æ•°}\\ \sum\limits_{f\in\text G}|C(f)|=&|\text G|\sum\limits_{c\in\text C}\frac{1}{ä¸cç­‰ä»·çš„ç€è‰²æ•°}\\ ç”±äºåœ¨ä¸€ä¸ªç­‰ä»·ç±»ä¸­&æ¯ç§ç€è‰²çš„è´¡çŒ®éƒ½æ˜¯\frac{1}{ä¸cç­‰ä»·çš„ç€è‰²æ•°}\\ æ‰€ä»¥\sum\limits_{f\in \text G}|C(f)|=&|G|\times N(\text G,\text C)\\ N(\text G,\text C)=&\frac{\sum\limits_{f\in \text G}|C(f)|}{|\text G|} \end{aligned}å¾—è¯

posts.title: Powerful Number ç­›å­¦ä¹ ç¬”è®°
posts.text: NMDæˆ‘æ€ä¹ˆç°åœ¨æ‰ä¼šè¿™æ²™é›•ç©æ„å„¿.jpg æ„Ÿè§‰æŒºç®€å•çš„ï¼Œä¸»è¦æ˜¯é€‚ç”¨èŒƒå›´æ¯”è¾ƒå°ï¼Œå¤§æ¦‚èƒ½ç­›æŸäº›æ€§è´¨æ¯”è¾ƒå¥‡å¦™çš„ä¸Šç•Œåœ¨ $10^{13}$ ~ $10^{14}$çš„ç§¯æ€§å‡½æ•° é¦–å…ˆä»‹ç» $\text{Powerful}$ $\text{Number}$ æ˜¯å•¥ï¼Œå½“ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°æ»¡è¶³å…¶æ‰€æœ‰è´¨å› æ•°çš„æŒ‡æ•°éƒ½å¤§äº $1$ çš„æ—¶å€™æˆ‘ä»¬ç§°å…¶ä¸º $\text{Powerful}$ $\text{Number}$ ï¼Œä¸‹é¢ç®€å•è¯´æ˜å…¶é‡è¦æ€§è´¨ï¼š $n$ ä»¥å†…çš„ $\text{Powerful}$ $\text{Number}$ çš„æ•°é‡ä¸º $\sqrt n$ çº§åˆ«çš„ï¼Œé¦–å…ˆå‘ç°æ¯ä¸ª $\text{Powerful}$ $\text{Number}$ éƒ½èƒ½è¡¨ç¤ºæˆ $x^2y^3$ çš„å½¢å¼ \begin{aligned} |\text{PowerfulNumber}\le n|=&\sum\limits_{x=1}^{\sqrt n}\lfloor\sqrt[3]{\frac nx}\rfloor\\ =&n^{\frac13}\sum\limits_{x=1}^{\sqrt n}x^{-\frac23}\\

#endif n=read(); if(n<2){ cout<<n; return 0; } int pre1=0,pre2=1; for(ri tmp,i=2;i<=n;++i){ tmp=pre2; pre2=add(pre1,add(pre2,pre2)); pre1=tmp; } cout<<pre2; return 0;} Perpetual Subtractionè§£é¢˜æ€è·¯ï¼š è¦ç”¨ä¸€ç‚¹çº¿æ€§ä»£æ•°ä¸­çŸ©é˜µå¯¹è§’åŒ–çš„çŸ¥è¯†ï¼Œå‰ç½®çŸ¥è¯†å¯ä»¥åœ¨ Linear algebra å­¦ è¿™é¢˜æƒ³åŠæ³•æ¨ä¸€æ¨è½¬ç§»çŸ©é˜µçš„æ¡¥æ¥çŸ©é˜µ $\Phi$ ï¼Œå‘ç°è¿˜è›®æœ‰è§„å¾‹çš„ï¼Œå¤§æ¦‚æ˜¯ $\Phi_{i,j}=(-1)^{i+j}C_j^i$ ï¼Œç„¶åå¯ä»¥æ¯”è¾ƒç®€å•çš„æ¨å‡º $\Phi^{-1}_{i,j}=C_j^i$ ï¼Œç„¶åå·¦ä¹˜çŸ©é˜µå°±æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªæ²™é›•å·ç§¯ç›´æ¥åšå°±å¥½~~æ„Ÿè§‰å•¥éƒ½æ²¡è®²æœ‰é—®é¢˜è¯„è®ºåŒºé—®å§~~ ä¸‹é¢ä»‹ç»å¦å¤–ä¸€ä¸ªæ–¹æ³•ï¼š é¦–å…ˆè®¾ $f_{0,i}$ è¡¨ç¤ºå½“å‰è½®å€¼ä¸º $i$ çš„æ¦‚ç‡ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆä¸‹ä¸€è½®å€¼ä¸º $i$ çš„æ¦‚ç‡ $f_{1,i}$ å¯ä»¥ç”¨ $f_0$ é€’æ¨ $$ \begin{aligned} f_{1,i}=&\sum\limits_{j=i}^nf_{0,j}\frac1{j+1}\\ åˆ—å‡ºç”Ÿæˆ&å‡½æ•°F_0(x),F_1(x)\\ F_1(x)=&\sum\limits_{i=0}^nx^i\sum\limits_{j=0}^nf_{0,j}\frac1{j+1}\\ =&\sum\limits_{j=0}^n\frac{f_{0,j}}{j+1}\sum\limits_{i=0}^jx^i\\ =&\sum\limits_{j=0}^nf_{0,j}\frac{x_j}{j+1}\frac{x^{j+1}-1}{x-1}\\ =&\frac1{x-1}\sum\limits_{j=0}^nf_{0,j}\int_1^xt^j\text dt\\ =&\frac{\int_1^xF_0(t)\text dt}{x-1}\\ ä»¤G_1(x)=&F_1(x+1)=\frac{\int_0^xF_0(t)\text dt}{x-1}\\ é‚£ä¹ˆg_{1,i}=&\frac{g_{0,i}}{i-1},g_{m,i}=\frac{g_{0,i}}{(i-1)^m}\\ ç”¨äºŒé¡¹å¼&åæ¼”æ¨å‡º f,g æ­£é€†å˜æ¢å³å¯ \end{aligned} $$ CODE 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081828384858687888990919293949596979899100101102103104105106107108109110111112113114#include<bits/stdc++.h>#define ri register intusing namespace std;typedef long long ll;typedef pair<int,int> pii;typedef vector<int> poly; for(ri i=21;~i;--i)w[i]=mul(w[i+1],w[i+1]); invv[0]=1; for(ri i=1,iv=mod+1>>1;i<23;++i)invv[i]=mul(invv[i-1],iv);}inline void ntt(poly&a,int type){ for(ri i=0;i<lim;++i)if(i<rev[tim][i])swap(a[i],a[rev[tim][i]]); for(ri i=1,t=0,a0,a1;i<lim;i<<=1,++t)for(ri j=0,len=i<<1;j<lim;j+=len) for(ri k=0,mt=1;k<i;++k,Mul(mt,w[t])){ a0=a[j+k],a1=mul(a[j+k+i],mt); a[j+k]=add(a0,a1),a[j+k+i]=dec(a0,a1); } if(~type)return; reverse(++a.begin(),a.end()); for(ri i=0;i<lim;++i)Mul(a[i],invv[tim]);}inline poly operator*(poly a,poly b){ int n=a.size(),m=b.size(),t=n+m-1; if(t<=64){ poly c(t); for(ri i=0;i<n;++i)for(ri j=0;j<m;++j) Add(c[i+j],mul(a[i],b[j])); for(ri i=2;i<=n+1;++i){ fac[i]=mul(fac[i-1],i); inv[i]=mul(inv[mod-mod/i*i],mod-mod/i); ifac[i]=mul(ifac[i-1],inv[i]); }}poly a,f,g;int main(){ #ifdef ldxcaicai freopen("lx.in","r",stdin); #endif n=read(); char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch))ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch))ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return ans;}namespace modular{ const int mod=998244353; inline int add(int a,int b){return a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod;} inline int dec(int a,int b){return a<b?a-b+mod:a-b;} inline int mul(int a,int b){return (ll)a*b%mod;} inline void Add(int&a,int b){a=a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod;} inline void Dec(int&a,int b){a=a<b?a-b+mod:a-b;} inline void Mul(int&a,int b){a=(ll)a*b%mod;} inline int ksm(int a,int p){int ret=1;for(;p;p>>=1,Mul(a,a))(p&1)&&(Mul(ret,a),1);return ret;}}using namespace modular;const int N=2e6+5;int n,a[N],mx=0,lim,pw[N];inline void fwt(int*f){ for(ri a0,a1,i=1;i<lim;i<<=1)for(ri j=0,len=i<<1;j<lim;j+=len) for(ri k=0;k<i;++k){ a0=a[j+k],a1=a[j+k+i]; a[j+k]=a0+a1,a[j+k+i]=a0-a1; }}inline void ifwt(int*f){ for(ri iv=mod+1>>1,a0,a1,i=1;i<lim;i<<=1)for(ri j=0,len=i<<1;j<lim;j+=len) for(ri k=0;k<i;++k){ a0=a[j+k],a1=a[j+k+i]; a[j+k]=add(a0,a1),a[j+k+i]=dec(a0,a1); Mul(a[j+k],iv),Mul(a[j+k+i],iv); }}int main(){ #ifdef ldxcaicai freopen("lx.in","r",stdin); #endif n=read(); pw[0]=1; for(ri i=1,vl;i<=n;++i){ pw[i]=add(pw[i-1],add(pw[i-1],pw[i-1])); ++a[0]; a[vl=read()]+=2; mx=max(mx,vl); } for(lim=1;lim<=mx;lim<<=1); fwt(a); for(ri x,i=0;i<lim;++i){ x=(a[i]+n)/4; a[i]=(n-x)&1?mod-pw[x]:pw[x]; } ifwt(a); cout<<dec(a[0],1); return 0;} Radix sumè§£é¢˜æ€è·¯ï¼š ä¸è€ƒè™‘æ¨¡æ•°çš„è¯å°±æ˜¯ $10$ è¿›åˆ¶ $fwt$ è£¸é¢˜ï¼Œç°åœ¨æœ‰äº†æ¨¡æ•°ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆå¯ä»¥æš´åŠ›æ‰©åŸŸï¼Œç”¨ä¸€ä¸ªå‘é‡ $(a_0,a_1,...,a_9)^{\text T}$ æ¥è¡¨ç¤ºä¸€ä¸ªæ•° $\sum\limits_{i=0}^9a_i\omega_{10}^i$ï¼Œè¿™æ ·å°±èƒ½å¤Ÿæ­£å¸¸çš„ $dft$ äº†ï¼Œç„¶åå†è€ƒè™‘æ€ä¹ˆæ±‚ $10$ çš„é€†å…ƒï¼Œå‘ç° $5$ çš„é€†å…ƒå¯ä»¥å¹¿ä¹‰æ¬§æ‹‰å®šç†ç›´æ¥æï¼Œ $2$ å¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥é™¤ï¼Œè¿™æ ·å°±åšå®Œäº†ï¼Œä¸è¿‡æœ€åæ±‚ç­”æ¡ˆçš„æ—¶å€™éœ€è¦çˆ†ç®—ä¸€æ³¢ CODE 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647484950515253545556575859606162636465666768697071727374757677787980818283848586878889909192#include<bits/stdc++.h>#define ri register intusing namespace std;typedef long long ll;typedef pair<int,int> pii;typedef vector<int> poly;typedef unsigned long long ull;const ull inv_5=57646075230342349ull;#define fi first#define se second#define pb push_backconst int rlen=1<<18|1;char buf[rlen],*ib=buf,*ob=buf;#define gc() (((ib==ob)&&(ob=(ib=buf)+fread(buf,1,rlen,stdin)),ib==ob)?-1:*ib++)inline int read(){ int ans=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch))ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch))ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return ans;}const int N=1e5+5;int n,a[N],mx=0,lim;ull c[20];struct cp{ ull a[10]; inline void clear(){for(ri i=0;i<10;++i)a[i]=0;} inline ull&operator[](const int&k){return a[k];} inline const ull&operator[](const int&k)const{return a[k];} friend inline cp operator*(cp a,cp b){ for(ri i=0;i<10;++i)for(ri j=0;j<10;++j)c[i+j]+=a[i]*b[j]; for(ri i=0;i<10;++i)a[i]=c[i]+c[i+10],c[i]=c[i+10]=0; return a; } friend inline void operator*=(cp&a,cp b){a=a*b;} friend inline cp operator^(cp a,int p){ cp res; res.clear(),res[0]=1; for(;p;p>>=1,a=a*a)if(p&1)res=res*a; return res; } inline cp fix(){ cp res=*this; for(ri i=0;i<10;++i)res[i]=(res[i]>>1)*inv_5; return res; } inline ull val(){return (a[0]-a[2]+a[7]-a[5])%(1ull<<58);}}f[N<<1];inline void dwt(cp*f){ cp s[10]; for(ri i=1;i<lim;i*=10)for(ri j=0,len=i*10;j<lim;j+=len) for(ri k=0;k<i;++k){ for(ri ps,p=0;p<10;++p){ s[p].clear(); for(ri ps,q=0;q<10;++q){ ps=p*q%10; for(ri o=0;o+ps<10;++o)s[p][o+ps]+=f[j+k+q*i][o]; for(ri o=10-ps;o<10;++o)s[p][o+ps-10]+=f[j+k+q*i][o]; } } for(ri p=0;p<10;++p)f[j+k+p*i]=s[p]; }}inline void idwt(cp*f){ static cp s[10]; for(ri i=1;i<lim;i*=10)for(ri j=0,len=i*10;j<lim;j+=len) for(ri k=0;k<i;++k){ for(ri ps,p=0;p<10;++p){ s[p].clear(); for(ri ps,q=0;q<10;++q){ ps=p*q%10; ps=ps?10-ps:0; for(ri o=0;o+ps<10;++o)s[p][o+ps]+=f[j+k+q*i][o]; for(ri o=10-ps;o<10;++o)s[p][o+ps-10]+=f[j+k+q*i][o]; } } for(ri p=0;p<10;++p)f[j+k+p*i]=s[p].fix(); }}int main(){ #ifdef ldxcaicai freopen("lx.in","r",stdin); #endif n=read(); for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i)++f[a[i]=read()][0],mx=max(mx,a[i]); for(lim=10;lim<mx;lim*=10); dwt(f); for(ri i=0;i<lim;++i)f[i]=f[i]^n; idwt(f); for(ri i=0;i<n;++i)cout<<f[i].val()<<'\n'; return 0;}

posts.text: ç›¸ä¼¼çŸ©é˜µ å®šä¹‰ï¼šè‹¥å¯¹äºçŸ©é˜µ $\text A$ å­˜åœ¨çŸ©é˜µ $\text B$ å’Œå¯é€†çŸ©é˜µ $\Phi$ æ»¡è¶³ $\text B=\Phi^{-1}\text A\Phi$ ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆæˆ‘ä»¬ç§° $\text A$ ç›¸ä¼¼äº $\text B$ ï¼Œè®°åš $\text A\sim\text B$ç›¸ä¼¼æœ‰å¦‚ä¸‹æ€§è´¨ï¼š åèº«æ€§ï¼š $\text A\sim\text A$ å¯¹ç§°æ€§ï¼š å¦‚æœ $\text A\sim\text B$ ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆ $\text B\sim\text A$ ä¼ é€’æ€§ï¼š å¦‚æœ $\text A\sim\text B,\text B\sim\text C$ ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆ $\text A\sim\text C$ ç›¸ä¼¼çŸ©é˜µæœ‰å¦‚ä¸‹æ€§è´¨ï¼š ä¸¤è€…çš„ç§©ç›¸ç­‰ ä¸¤è€…çš„è¡Œåˆ—å¼å€¼ç›¸ç­‰ ä¸¤è€…æ‹¥æœ‰åŒæ ·çš„ç‰¹å¾å€¼ï¼Œå°½ç®¡ç›¸åº”çš„ç‰¹å¾å‘é‡ä¸€èˆ¬ä¸åŒ ä¸¤è€…æ‹¥æœ‰åŒæ ·çš„ç‰¹å¾å¤šé¡¹å¼ ä¸¤è€…å¯é€†æ€§ç›¸åŒï¼Œè‹¥å‡å¯é€†ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆä¸¤è€…çš„é€†çŸ©é˜µåŒæ ·ç›¸ä¼¼ åšä¸»ä»…å¯¹ç¬¬å››ç‚¹è¿›è¡Œè¯æ˜ï¼š \begin{aligned} 0=|\lambda\text E-\text B|=&|\Phi^{-1}\lambda\Phi-\Phi^{-1}\text A\Phi|\\ =&|\Phi^{-1}(\lambda\text E-\text A)\Phi|\\ =&|\Phi^{-1}|\times|\lambda\text E-\text A|\times|\Phi|\\ =&0\\ \Rightarrow&|\lambda\text E-\text A|=0 \end{aligned} ç”¨é€”å¯ä»¥ç”¨äºè§£å†³å…³äºå¯¹è§’åŒ–çŸ©é˜µçš„é—®é¢˜ï¼Œå‡è®¾ä¸€ä¸ªçŸ©é˜µ $\text A$ ä¸å¯¹è§’çŸ©é˜µ $\text B$ ç›¸ä¼¼ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆæœ‰ \begin{aligned} \text A^m=&(\Phi^{-1}\text B\Phi)^m\\ =&\Phi^{-1}\text B(\Phi\text A\Phi^{-1})^{m-1}\Phi\\ =&\Phi^{-1}\text B^m\Phi \end{aligned}é—®é¢˜è½¬åŒ–ä¸ºæ±‚æ¡¥æ¥çŸ©é˜µ $\Phi$ ï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªå°±å„å‡­æœ¬äº‹äº† å¥½å§è¿˜æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªå®šç†å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼šè‹¥ $\text A$ ä¸å¯¹è§’çŸ©é˜µ $\text B$ ç›¸ä¼¼ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆ $\text A$ æœ‰ $n$ ä¸ªçº¿æ€§æ— å…³çš„ç‰¹å¾å‘é‡ï¼Œè®¾ä¸º $v_i$ ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆ $\Phi$ å°±æ˜¯å°† $v_1\cdots v_n$ æ¨ªå‘æ‹¼æ¥èµ·æ¥å¾—åˆ°çš„çŸ©é˜µ é—®é¢˜è½¬åŒ–ä¸ºæ±‚é€†çŸ©é˜µ $\Phi^{-1}$ ï¼Œè¿™å›æ˜¯çœŸçš„å„å‡­æœ¬äº‹äº†

ot=\emptyset,d|\gcd{\{T\}}}(-1)^T}\ =&\prod\limits_{d}g_d \end{aligned} $$ CODE 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051#include<bits/stdc++.h>#define ri register intusing namespace std;typedef long long ll;typedef pair<int,int> pii;typedef vector<int> poly;#define fi first#define se second#define pb push_backconst int rlen=1<<18|1;char buf[rlen],*ib=buf,*ob=buf;#define gc() (((ib==ob)&&(ob=(ib=buf)+fread(buf,1,rlen,stdin)),ib==ob)?-1:*ib++)inline int read(){ int ans=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch))ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch))ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return ans;}namespace modular{ int mod; inline int add(int a,int b){return a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod;} inline int dec(int a,int b){return a<b?a-b+mod:a-b;} inline int mul(int a,int b){return (ll)a*b%mod;} inline void Add(int&a,int b){a=a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod;} inline void Dec(int&a,int b){a=a<b?a-b+mod:a-b;} inline void Mul(int&a,int b){a=(ll)a*b%mod;} inline int ksm(int a,int p){int ret=1;for(;p;p>>=1,Mul(a,a))(p&1)&&(Mul(ret,a),1);return ret;} inline int Inv(int a){return ksm(a,mod-2);}}using namespace modular;const int N=1e6+5;int f[N],g[N],n;int main(){ #ifdef ldxcaicai freopen("lx.in","r",stdin); #endif for(ri tt=read();tt;--tt){ n=read(),mod=read(); f[1]=g[1]=1; for(ri i=2;i<=n;++i)f[i]=g[i]=add(add(f[i-1],f[i-1]),f[i-2]); for(ri t,i=2;i<=n;++i){ t=Inv(g[i]); for(ri j=i+i;j<=n;j+=i)Mul(g[j],t); } int res=0,pre=1; for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i)Mul(pre,g[i]),Add(res,mul(pre,i)); cout<<res<<'
'; } return 0;} ç”Ÿæˆæ ‘è®¡æ•°è§£é¢˜æ€è·¯ï¼š è€ƒè™‘ $k$ æ¬¡å¹‚çš„ç»„åˆæ„ä¹‰å¯ä»¥ç”¨ç”Ÿæˆå‡½æ•°è¡¨ç¤ºï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆå¯¹äºæ¯ä¸€æ¡è¾¹æ„é€ ç”Ÿæˆå‡½æ•° $f_t(x)=\sum\limits_{i=0}^{+\infty} rac{(w_tx)^i}{i!}$ ï¼Œç„¶åæŠŠè¿™ä¸ªå½“æˆå…ƒç´ æ±‚è¡Œåˆ—å¼å€¼æœ€åå–å¤šé¡¹å¼çš„ç¬¬ $K$ é¡¹ç³»æ•°å³å¯ï¼Œç„¶è€Œç›´æ¥ç”¨å¤šé¡¹å¼æ±‚å€¼ä¸æ˜¯å¾ˆå¥½åšï¼Œå› æ­¤æˆ‘ä»¬å¸¦å…¥ç‚¹å€¼è¿›å»ç®—æœ€åç”¨ç‰›é¡¿æ’å€¼/æ‹‰æ ¼æœ—æ—¥æ’å€¼æŠŠç³»æ•°æå‡ºæ¥å°±è¡Œäº† CODE 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081828384858687888990919293949596979899100101102103#include<bits/stdc++.h>#define ri register int#define fi first#define se second#define pb push_backusing namespace std;typedef long long ll;typedef pair<int,int> pii;const int rlen=1<<18|1;char buf[rlen],*ib=buf,*ob=buf;#define gc() (((ib==ob)&&(ob=(ib=buf)+fread(buf,1,rlen,stdin)),ib==ob)?-1:*ib++)inline int read(){ int ans=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch))ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch))ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return ans;}namespace modular{ const int mod=1e9+7; inline int add(int a,int b){return a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod;} inline int dec(int a,int b){return a<b?a-b+mod:a-b;} inline int mul(int a,int b){return (ll)a*b%mod;} inline void Add(int&a,int b){a=a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod;} inline void Dec(int&a,int b){a=a<b?a-b+mod:a-b;} inline void Mul(int&a,int b){a=(ll)a*b%mod;} inline int ksm(int a,int p){int ret=1;for(;p;p>>=1,Mul(a,a))(p&1)&&(Mul(ret,a),1);return ret;} inline int Inv(int x){return ksm(x,mod-2);} inline int fix(int x){return (x%mod+mod)%mod;}}using namespace modular;const int N=55,M=10005;int n,K,m,w[N][N],a[N][N],f[N],fac[M],ifac[M],inv[M];inline void init(){ fac[0]=ifac[0]=fac[1]=ifac[1]=inv[1]=1; for(ri i=2;i<=10000;++i){ fac[i]=mul(fac[i-1],i); inv[i]=mul(inv[mod-mod/i*i],mod-mod/i); ifac[i]=mul(ifac[i-1],inv[i]); }}inline int calc(){ int res=1; for(ri ps,i=1;i<n;++i){ for(ps=i;ps<=n;++ps)if(a[ps][i]){ ps=i; break; } if(ps==n+1)return 0; if(ps^i){ for(ri j=1;j<=n;++j)swap(a[ps][j],a[i][j]); res=res?mod-res:0; } for(ri j=1,t,iv=Inv(a[i][i]);j<=n;++j)if(j!=i&&a[j][i]){ t=mul(a[j][i],iv); for(ri k=i;k<=n;++k)Dec(a[j][k],mul(t,a[i][k])); } Mul(res,a[i][i]); } return res;}struct Newton_Inter{ int up,px[M],py[M],cur,dt[2][M],f[M],ff[M]; Newton_Inter(){up=cur=0;} inline int&operator[](const int&k){return f[k];} inline const int&operator[](const int&k)const{return f[k];} inline void insert(int x,int y){ px[++up]=x,py[up]=y; if(up==1)dt[cur][0]=f[0]=y,ff[0]=1; else{ cur^=1,dt[cur][0]=y; for(ri i=1;i<up;++i)dt[cur][i]=mul(dec(dt[cur][i-1],dt[!cur][i-1]),inv[px[up]-px[up-i]]); for(ri i=up-1;~i;--i)ff[i]=add(i?ff[i-1]:0,mul(mod-px[up-1],ff[i])); for(ri i=0;i<up;++i)Add(f[i],mul(ff[i],dt[cur][up-1])); } }}F;int main(){ #ifdef ldxcaicai freopen("lx.in","r",stdin); #endif n=read(),K=read(); init(); for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i)for(ri j=1;j<=n;++j)w[i][j]=read(); m=n*K; for(ri t=0;t<=m;++t){ for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i)for(ri j=1;j<=n;++j)a[i][j]=0; for(ri res,i=1;i<=n;++i)for(ri j=1;j<i;++j){ res=0; for(ri mt=1,_t=mul(t,w[i][j]),_pw=0;_pw<=K;++_pw){ Add(res,mul(mt,ifac[_pw])); Mul(mt,_t); } Add(a[i][i],res); Add(a[j][j],res); Dec(a[i][j],res); Dec(a[j][i],res); } F.insert(t,calc()); } cout<<mul(F[K],fac[K]); return 0;} Mike and Fishè§£é¢˜æ€è·¯ï¼š è€ƒè™‘å°†è¡Œåˆ—æ‰¯å‡ºæ¥å»ºäºŒåˆ†å›¾ï¼Œç„¶åå°†é™åˆ¶æ”¹ä¸º $black=white$ ä¸”ä¿è¯åˆæ³•æ€ä¹ˆåšï¼Œå‘ç°åªç”¨åœ¨äºŒåˆ†å›¾ä¸Šè·‘æ¬§æ‹‰å›è·¯å³å¯ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆç°åœ¨å¯èƒ½æœ‰åº¦æ•°ä¸ºå¥‡æ•°çš„ç‚¹ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬åœ¨ä¸¤è¾¹å„å»ºä¸€ä¸ªè™šç‚¹å¤„ç†å³å¯ CODE 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657#include<bits/stdc++.h>#define ri register int#define fi first#define se second#define pb push_backusing namespace std;typedef long long ll;typedef pair<int,int> pii;const int rlen=1<<18|1;char buf[rlen],*ib=buf,*ob=buf;#define gc() (((ib==ob)&&(ob=(ib=buf)+fread(buf,1,rlen,stdin)),ib==ob)?-1:*ib++)inline int read(){ int ans=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch))ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch))ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return ans;}const int N=4e5+5;int n,idx=0;bool col[N],vs[N];pii a[N];vector<pii>e[N];void dfs(int p){ pii tmp; while((int)e[p].size()){ tmp=e[p].back(); e[p].pop_back(); if(vs[tmp.se])continue; vs[tmp.se]=1; col[tmp.se]=p<tmp.fi; dfs(tmp.fi); }}int main(){ #ifdef ldxcaicai freopen("lx.in","r",stdin); #endif n=read(); for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i){ a[i].fi=read(); a[i].se=read()+200000; ++idx; e[a[i].fi].pb(pii(a[i].se,idx)); e[a[i].se].pb(pii(a[i].fi,idx)); } for(ri i=1;i<=400000;++i){ if(((int)e[i].size())&1){ ++idx; e[i].pb(pii(400001,idx)); e[400001].pb(pii(i,idx)); } } for(ri i=1;i<=400001;++i)dfs(i); for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i)cout<<(col[i]?'r':'b'); return 0;} XOR Replaceè§£é¢˜æ€è·¯ï¼š è®¾ $a_{n+1}=\oplus_{i=1}^na_i$ ï¼Œä»”ç»†è§‚å¯Ÿå‘ç°æ¯æ¬¡æ“ä½œç›¸å½“äº $swap(a_i,a_{n+1})$ ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆæˆ‘ä»¬å°†ä¸åŒçš„ $(a_i,b_i)$ è¿è¾¹ï¼Œæœ€åæŒ‰ç…§è¿é€šå—æ•°è®¨è®ºå³å¯å¾—åˆ°ç­”æ¡ˆï¼Œå¤§æ¦‚å°±æ˜¯è”é€šå—å†…æŒ‰ç…§ç½®æ¢çš„æ–¹å¼ä¸€å®šå¯ä»¥ç”¨è¿é€šå—å¤§å°æ•°æ¬¡æ¢å®Œï¼Œä¸¤ä¸ªè¿é€šå—ä¹‹é—´éœ€è¦ç”¨ä¸€æ¬¡æ¥è¿›è¡Œè½¬æ¢ CODE 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061626364656667#include<bits/stdc++.h>#define ri register int#define fi first#define se second#define pb push_backusing namespace std;typedef long long ll;typedef pair<int,int> pii;const int rlen=1<<18|1;char buf[rlen],*ib=buf,*ob=buf;#define gc() (((ib==ob)&&(ob=(ib=buf)+fread(buf,1,rlen,stdin)),ib==ob)?-1:*ib++)inline int read(){ int ans=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch))ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch))ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return ans;}const int N=4e5+5;int n,a[N],b[N],_a[N],_b[N];inline bool check(){ for(ri i=1;i<=n+1;++i)_a[i]=a[i],_b[i]=b[i]; sort(_a+1,_a+n+2); sort(_b+1,_b+n+2); for(ri i=1;i<=n+1;++i)if(_a[i]^_b[i])return 0; return 1;}int vl[N<<1],sig=0;inline int Find(int x){return lower_bound(vl+1,vl+sig+1,x)-vl;}int ft[N<<1];inline int find(int x){return x^ft[x]?ft[x]=find(ft[x]):x;}int main(){ #ifdef ldxcaicai freopen("lx.in","r",stdin); #endif n=read(); for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i)a[n+1]^=(a[i]=read()); for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i)b[n+1]^=(b[i]=read()); if(!check()){ cout<<-1; return 0; } int res=0; vl[++sig]=a[n+1]; vl[++sig]=b[n+1]; for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i){ if(a[i]==b[i])continue; vl[++sig]=a[i]; vl[++sig]=b[i]; ++res; } if(!res){ cout<<0; return 0; } sort(vl+1,vl+sig+1),sig=unique(vl+1,vl+sig+1)-vl-1; for(ri i=1;i<=sig;++i)ft[i]=i; for(ri i=1;i<=n+1;++i){ if(a[i]==b[i])continue; a[i]=find(Find(a[i])); b[i]=find(Find(b[i])); if(a[i]^b[i])ft[b[i]]=a[i]; } for(ri i=1;i<=sig;++i)if(ft[i]==i)++res; cout<<res-1; return 0;} Two Treesè§£é¢˜æ€è·¯ï¼š èƒ½å¦æ„é€ åªéœ€è€ƒè™‘åŒä¸€ä¸ªç‚¹åœ¨ä¸¤æ£µæ ‘ä¸­å„¿å­æ•°çš„å¥‡å¶æ€§æ˜¯å¦ç›¸åŒï¼Œä¸‹é¢ç»™å‡ºç›¸åŒæ—¶çš„æ„é€ æ–¹æ¡ˆ é¦–å…ˆä¸€æ£µæ ‘ä¸­ä¸€å®šæœ‰å¥‡æ•°ä¸ªå€¼ä¸ºå¥‡æ•°çš„ç‚¹ï¼Œä¸å¦¨è®¾ä¸º $2k+1$ ä¸ªï¼Œè€ƒè™‘è®©å…¶ä¸­ $2k$ ä¸ªä¸¤ä¸¤é…å¯¹ä¸€ä¸ª $1$ ä¸€ä¸ª $-1$ ï¼Œå‰©ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªéšæ„ $1$ æˆ–è€… $-1$ å°±èƒ½ä¿è¯è¿™ä¸ªå­æ ‘çš„æƒå€¼å’Œç»å¯¹å€¼ä¸º $1$ ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆè€ƒè™‘æ€ä¹ˆé™åˆ¶ $1$ å’Œ $-1$ åŒ¹é…çš„å…³ç³»ï¼šå¯ä»¥å°†å½“å‰æœªåŒ¹é…ä¸”å„¿å­æ•°ä¸ºå¶æ•°çš„ç‚¹æ”¾åˆ°ä¸€ä¸ªåºåˆ—ä¸­ç„¶åæ¯ä¸¤ä¸ªè¿ä¸€æ¡è¾¹ï¼Œè¿™æ ·ä¸¤æ£µæ ‘éƒ½è¿å¥½åä¸€å®šæå‡ºæ¥ä¸€ä¸ªäºŒåˆ†å›¾ï¼ŒäºŒåˆ†å›¾æŸ“è‰²å³å¯ CODE 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869#include<bits/stdc++.h>#define ri register int#define fi first#define se second#define pb push_backusing namespace std;typedef long long ll;typedef pair<int,int> pii;const int rlen=1<<18|1;char buf[rlen],*ib=buf,*ob=buf;#define gc() (((ib==ob)&&(ob=(ib=buf)+fread(buf,1,rlen,stdin)),ib==ob)?-1:*ib++)inline int read(){ int ans=0; bool f=1; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch))f^=ch=='-',ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch))ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return f?ans:-ans;}const int N=1e5+5;int n,ans[N];vector<int>e[N];struct Tree{ vector<int>g[N]; int rt,stk[N],top; void dfs(int p){ for(ri i=0,v;i<g[p].size();++i)dfs(v=g[p][i]); if(!(((int)g[p].size())&1))stk[++top]=p; while(top>1){ e[stk[top]].pb(stk[top-1]); e[stk[top-1]].pb(stk[top]); top-=2; } } inline void init(){ for(ri ft,i=1;i<=n;++i){ ft=read(); if(ft==-1)rt=i; else g[ft].pb(i); } } inline void solve(){ top=0; dfs(rt); }}t[2];bool vs[N],col[N];void dfs(int p,int cl){ if(vs[p])return; vs[p]=1; col[p]=cl; for(ri i=0;i<e[p].size();++i)dfs(e[p][i],cl^1);}int main(){ #ifdef ldxcaicai freopen("lx.in","r",stdin); #endif n=read(); for(ri i=0;i<2;++i)t[i].init(); for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i)if(((int)t[0].g[i].size()+(int)t[1].g[i].size())&1){ puts("IMPOSSIBLE"); return 0; } puts("POSSIBLE"); for(ri i=0;i<2;++i)t[i].solve(); for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i)dfs(i,0); for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i)cout<<((((int)t[0].g[i].size())&1)?0:(col[i]?1:-1))<<' '; return 0;}

Sockpuppetsè§£é¢˜æ€è·¯ï¼š è€ƒè™‘åˆ°é¢˜ç›®çš„åŒ¹é…æ¡ä»¶æ˜¾ç„¶éœ€è¦å»ºä¸€æ£µ $trie$ æ ‘å‡ºæ¥ï¼Œæ³¨æ„åˆ°è¿™æ£µæ ‘æ·±åº¦ä¸è¶…è¿‡ $10$ ï¼Œè€ƒè™‘è®¾ $f_{i,j,k}$ è¡¨ç¤ºå½“å‰å¤„ç†åˆ°å­æ ‘ $i$ ï¼Œå­æ ‘ä¸­æœ‰ $j$ ä¸ªç‚¹éœ€è¦è¿›è¡ŒåŒ¹é…ï¼Œè‡ªå·±çš„ç¥–å…ˆå·²ç»æœ‰ $k$ ä¸ªè¢«æå‰é€‰ç”¨åŒ¹é…çš„æ–¹æ¡ˆæ•°ï¼Œç„¶åæŒ‰ç…§å½“å‰ç‚¹çš„ç±»å‹åˆ†å¼€è½¬ç§»å³å¯ CODE 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081828384858687888990919293949596979899100101102103104105106107108109110111112113114115116117118119120121122123124125126127128129130131132133134#include<bits/stdc++.h>#define ri register int#define pb push_back#define fi first#define se secondusing namespace std;typedef double db;typedef long long ll;typedef pair<int,int> pii;typedef pair<ll,int> pli;typedef pair<int,ll> pil;typedef pair<ll,ll> pll;typedef unsigned long long Ull;typedef unsigned int uii;typedef double db;typedef long double ld;const int rlen=1<<18|1;char buf[rlen],*ib=buf,*ob=buf;#define gc() (((ib==ob)&&(ob=(ib=buf)+fread(buf,1,rlen,stdin)),ib==ob)?-1:*ib++)inline int read(){ int ans=0; bool f=1; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch))f^=ch=='-',ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch))ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return f?ans:-ans;}inline ll readl(){ ll ans=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch))ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch))ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return ans;}inline int Read(char*s){ int top=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isalpha(ch))ch=gc(); while(isalpha(ch))s[++top]=ch,ch=gc(); return top;}namespace modular{ const int mod=1e9+7; inline int add(int a,int b){return a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod;} inline int dec(int a,int b){return a<b?a-b+mod:a-b;} inline int mul(int a,int b){return (ll)a*b%mod;} inline void Add(int&a,int b){a=a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod;} inline void Dec(int&a,int b){a=a<b?a-b+mod:a-b;} inline void Mul(int&a,int b){a=(ll)a*b%mod;} inline int ksm(int a,int p){int ret=1;for(;p;p>>=1,Mul(a,a))(p&1)&&(Mul(ret,a),1);return ret;} inline int Inv(int a){return ksm(a,mod-2);} inline void fix(int&a){a=(a%mod+mod)%mod;}}using namespace modular;template<typename T>inline void ckmin(T&a,T b){a>b?a=b:0;}template<typename T>inline void ckmax(T&a,T b){a<b?a=b:0;}const int N=20005;int f[N][15][25],tmp[15][25],n,m;inline int calc1(int x){return x<2?1:mod+1>>1;}inline int calc2(int x,int y){ if(!x)return 1; if(x==1)return y; return (ll)y*(y-1)/2%mod;}namespace trie{ int tot,son[N][26],cnt1[N],cnt2[N]; inline int newnode(){ ++tot; memset(son[tot],0,sizeof(son[tot])); cnt1[tot]=cnt2[tot]=0; return tot; } inline void insert(char*s,int len,int c1,int c2){ int p=0; for(ri x,i=1;i<=len;++i){ x=s[i]-'a'; if(!son[p][x])son[p][x]=newnode(); p=son[p][x]; } cnt1[p]+=c1,cnt2[p]+=c2; } void dfs(int p){ for(ri i=0;i<=10;++i)for(ri j=0;j<=20;++j)f[p][i][j]=0; f[p][0][0]=1; for(ri v,s=0;s<26;++s)if(son[p][s]){ dfs(v=son[p][s]); for(ri i=0;i<=10;++i)for(ri j=0;j<=20;++j)if(f[p][i][j]) for(ri k=0;k+i<=10;++k)for(ri l=0;j+l<=20;++l)if(f[v][k][l]) Add(tmp[i+k][j+l],mul(f[p][i][j],f[v][k][l])); for(ri i=0;i<=10;++i)for(ri j=0;j<=20;++j){ f[p][i][j]=tmp[i][j]; tmp[i][j]=0; } } if(!cnt1[p]&&!cnt2[p])return; for(ri i=0;i<=10;++i)for(ri j=0;j<=20;++j)if(f[p][i][j]){ if(cnt1[p]){ for(ri k=0;k<=2;++k)for(ri l=0;l<=2;++l) if(k+l>0&&k+l<3&&i+k<=10&&j>=l)Add(tmp[i+k][j-l],mul(f[p][i][j],mul(calc1(k),calc2(l,j)))); } cout<<res[pw[n]-1]<<'

for(ri j=1;j<=m;++j){ ht[i][j]=s[i][j]?ht[i-1][j]+1:0; while(top&&ht[i][stk[top]]>ht[i][j])--top; cnt[i][j]=cnt[i][stk[top]]+ht[i][j]*(j-stk[top]); stk[++top]=j; } } if(f1)for(ri i=1;i+i<=n;++i)for(ri j=1;j<=m;++j)swap(cnt[i][j],cnt[n-i+1][j]); if(f2)for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i)for(ri j=1;j+j<=m;++j)swap(cnt[i][j],cnt[i][m-j+1]);}inline int solve(){ int res=0; for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i)for(ri j=1;j<=m;++j){ a[i][j]=add(dec(a[i][j],a[i-1][j-1]),add(a[i-1][j],a[i][j-1])); Add(res,ksm(a[i][j],K)); } return res;}inline void clear(){for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i)for(ri j=1;j<=m;++j)a[i][j]=0;}int main(){ #ifdef ldxcaicai freopen("lx.in","r",stdin); #endif n=read(),m=read(),K=read(); return 0;} Permuted Matricesè§£é¢˜æ€è·¯ï¼š ~~æ˜¾ç„¶å®¹æ–¥å³å¯~~ï¼Œè€ƒè™‘åªæœ‰ä¸€è¡Œçš„æ—¶å€™å’‹åšï¼Œè€ƒè™‘æŠŠæ•´ä¸ªåºåˆ—åˆ†æˆ $\lfloor rac{n}{k}floor$ æ®µï¼Œè®¾ $f_i$ è¡¨ç¤ºå‰ $i$ æ®µå¸¦å®¹æ–¥ç³»æ•°çš„ç­”æ¡ˆï¼Œç„¶åæšä¸¾æœ€å $j$ æ®µå¯ä»¥å¼ºåˆ¶åˆå¹¶æˆä¸€æ®µè½¬ç§»å³å¯ï¼Œå³ $f_{i}=\sum\limits_{j=1}^if_{i-j}C_{ik}^{jk}$ ï¼ŒåŠ ä¸Šè¡Œçš„é™åˆ¶å°±æ˜¯æŠŠåé¢çš„ç»„åˆæ•°ç»™è¡Œæ•°æ¬¡æ–¹ï¼Œç„¶åå˜ä¸ªå½¢å°±èƒ½ä¸Šå¤šé¡¹å¼æï¼Œ~~ä¸è¿‡æ¨¡æ•°å¤ªé‚£å•¥äºæ˜¯å¯ä»¥æš´åŠ›~~ CODE 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061626364656667#include<bits/stdc++.h>#define ri register intusing namespace std;typedef long long ll;typedef pair<int,int> pii;#define fi first#define se second#define pb push_backconst int rlen=1<<18|1;char buf[rlen],*ib=buf,*ob=buf;#define gc() (((ib==ob)&&(ob=(ib=buf)+fread(buf,1,rlen,stdin)),ib==ob)?-1:*ib++)namespace modular{ const int mod=1000000123; inline int add(int a,int b){return a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod;} inline int dec(int a,int b){return a<b?a-b+mod:a-b;} inline int mul(int a,int b){return (ll)a*b%mod;} inline void Add(int&a,int b){a=a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod;} inline void Dec(int&a,int b){a=a<b?a-b+mod:a-b;} inline void Mul(int&a,int b){a=(ll)a*b%mod;} inline int ksm(int a,int p){int ret=1;for(;p;p>>=1,Mul(a,a))(p&1)&&(Mul(ret,a),1);return ret;}}using namespace modular;const int N=50005;int fac[N],ifac[N],f[N],n,pre[N];inline void init(){ fac[0]=fac[1]=ifac[0]=ifac[1]=1; for(ri i=2;i<=n;++i){ fac[i]=mul(fac[i-1],i); ifac[i]=mul(ifac[mod-mod/i*i],mod-mod/i); } for(ri i=2;i<=n;++i)Mul(ifac[i],ifac[i-1]); for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i){ fac[i]=ksm(fac[i],n); ifac[i]=ksm(ifac[i],n); }}inline int C(int n,int m){return n<m||m<0?0:mul(fac[n],mul(ifac[m],ifac[n-m]));}vector<int>a;inline int solve(){ f[0]=1; for(ri ss,pre=0,i=1;i<a.size();++i){ pre+=a[i]; f[i]=0; ss=0; for(ri j=i-1;~j;--j){ ss+=a[j+1]; if((i-j)&1)Add(f[i],mul(f[j],C(pre,ss))); else Dec(f[i],mul(f[j],C(pre,ss))); } } return f[a.size()-1];}int main(){ #ifdef ldxcaicai freopen("lx.in","r",stdin); #endif n=50000; init(); int res=0; for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i){ a.resize(1); for(ri j=n;j;j-=a.back())a.pb(min(i,j)); Add(res,solve()); } cout<<res; return 0;}

++len; coe*=1.0/((ld)e[j].size()+1); } } cur=0; for(ri i=2;i<=n;++i)f[cur][i]=w[1][i]; for(ri i=3;i<=K;++i)cur^=1,solve(i,n,i-1,n); printf("%.4Lf\n",f[cur][n]); } return 0;}

ps=i; a[++sig]=a[i]; } else ckmax(ans,(ll)(a[i].se-a[i].fi)*(a[ps].se-a[ps].fi)); } solve(1,sig,1,sig); cout<<ans; return 0;} åœ°å›¾è§£é¢˜æ€è·¯ï¼š é¦–å…ˆè€ƒè™‘ä¸€ä¸ªè´ªå¿ƒï¼Œå°†æ‰€æœ‰æ•°è¿›è¡Œæ’åºç„¶ååˆ†æˆä¸è¶…è¿‡ $m$ å—ä¸€å®šæ˜¯æœ€ä¼˜çš„ï¼Œè¯æ˜æ˜¾ç„¶ ç„¶åå°±å¯ä»¥ $f_{i,j}$ è¡¨ç¤ºå‰ $i$ ä¸ªæ•°åˆ†ä¸º $j$ å—çš„æœ€ä¼˜è´¡çŒ®ï¼Œé¢„å¤„ç†æ‰€æœ‰åŒºé—´çš„è´¡çŒ®å³å¯ï¼Œå¤æ‚åº¦ $O(n^2m)$ CODE 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475#include<bits/stdc++.h>#define ri register int#define pb push_back#define fi first#define se secondusing namespace std;typedef long long ll;typedef pair<int,int> pii;typedef pair<ll,int> pli;typedef pair<int,ll> pil;typedef unsigned long long Ull;typedef unsigned int uii;typedef set<int>::iterator It;const int rlen=1<<18|1;char buf[rlen],*ib=buf,*ob=buf;#define gc() (((ib==ob)&&(ob=(ib=buf)+fread(buf,1,rlen,stdin)),ib==ob)?-1:*ib++)inline int read(){ int ans=0; for(ri i=b[p];~i;--i){ f[p][a[p]*i][i]=vl[p]*i; for(ri j=1;j<=m;++j){ ckmax(f[p][j][i],f[p][j-1][i]); suf[p][j][i]=max(f[p][j][i],suf[p][j][i+1]); } } return; } b[p]=inf,a[p]=0; for(ri v,w,i=0;i<e[p].size();++i){ v=e[p][i].fi,w=e[p][i].se; dfs(v); a[p]+=a[v]*w; ckmin(b[p],b[v]/w); } ckmin(b[p],m/a[p]); for(ri i=b[p];~i;--i){ f[p][i*a[p]][i]=i*vl[p]; for(ri j=0,v,w,sw,svl;j<e[p].size();++j){ v=e[p][j].fi,w=e[p][j].se,sw=w*i*a[v],svl=w*i*vl[v]; for(ri k=m;k>=i*a[p];--k)for(ri l=0,up=m-max(k,sw);l<=up;++l) ckmax(f[p][k+l][i],f[p][k][i]+suf[v][sw+l][w*i]-svl); } for(ri j=1;j<=m;++j){ ckmax(f[p][j][i],f[p][j-1][i]); suf[p][j][i]=max(f[p][j][i],suf[p][j][i+1]); return ans;}inline int Read(char*s){ int top=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isalpha(ch))ch=gc(); while(isalpha(ch))s[++top]=ch,ch=gc(); return top;}namespace modular{ const int mod=1e9+7; inline int add(int a,int b){return a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod;} inline int dec(int a,int b){return a<b?a-b+mod:a-b;} inline int mul(int a,int b){return (ll)a*b%mod;} inline void Add(int&a,int b){a=a+b<mod?a+b:a+b-mod;} inline void Dec(int&a,int b){a=a<b?a-b+mod:a-b;} inline void Mul(int&a,int b){a=(ll)a*b%mod;} inline int ksm(int a,int p){int ret=1;for(;p;p>>=1,Mul(a,a))(p&1)&&(Mul(ret,a),1);return ret;} inline int Inv(int a){return ksm(a,mod-2);} inline void fix(int&a){a=(a%mod+mod)%mod;}}using namespace modular;template<typename T>inline void ckmin(T&a,T b){a>b?a=b:0;}template<typename T>inline void ckmax(T&a,T b){a<b?a=b:0;}const int N=1e6+5,inf=0x3f3f3f3f;vector<int>e[N];int n,du[N],rt,mn[N];void dfs(int p,int ft){ if(du[p]<=2)mn[p]=p; else mn[p]=inf; for(ri i=0,v;i<e[p].size();++i){ if((v=e[p][i])==ft)continue; dfs(v,p),ckmin(mn[p],mn[v]); }}inline int get1(int x,int ft){ int res=0x3f3f3f3f; for(ri i=0,v;i<e[x].size();++i){ if((v=e[x][i])==ft)continue; } else{ if(p<mn[tmp[0]]){ cout<<p<<' '; print(tmp[0],p,0); } else{ print(tmp[0],p,0); cout<<p<<' '; } } } else{ if(f){ if(get2(tmp[0],p)>get2(tmp[1],p))swap(tmp[0],tmp[1]); cout<<p<<' '; print(tmp[0],p,0); g[p][0]=f[p][0]; for(ri j=1;j<=d;++j)g[p][j]+=g[v][j-1]; for(ri j=1;j<=d;++j)ckmin(g[p][j],g[p][j-1]); } ckmin(g[p][d+1],g[p][d]);}int main(){ #ifdef ldxcaicai freopen("lx.in","r",stdin); #endif n=read(),d=read(); for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i)a[i]=read(); m=read(); for(ri i=1;i<=m;++i)is[read()]=1; for(ri i=1,u,v;i<n;++i){ u=read(),v=read(); e[u].pb(v); e[v].pb(u); } dfs(1,0); cout<<f[1][0]; return 0;}

posts.text: çº¿æ®µæ ‘è§£é¢˜æ€è·¯ï¼š è€ƒè™‘åˆ°å¦‚æœç»Ÿè®¡ç»Ÿè®¡ $f_{i,j}$ è¡¨ç¤ºç¬¬ $i$ ä¸ªä½ç½®çš„æ•°æœ€ç»ˆç­‰äº $j$ çš„æ¦‚ç‡ï¼Œç„¶åå¯¹äºä¸€ä¸ªä½ç½® $i$ ç­”æ¡ˆå°±æ˜¯ $\sum\limits_{j}f_{i,j}vl_j$ ï¼Œç„¶åå°±èƒ½å¤Ÿè¿›è¡Œè½¬åŒ–ï¼Œå˜ä¸ºæ±‚æ¯ä¸ªä½ç½®æœ€ç»ˆ $\ge j$ çš„æ¦‚ç‡ï¼Œç„¶åå°±èƒ½å¤Ÿæšä¸¾æ¯ä¸ªæ’åç„¶åå¯¹ç¬›å¡å°”æ ‘çš„ä¸€äº›å­æ ‘è¿›è¡Œå¦‚ä¸‹ $dp$ : å¯¹äºä¸€ä¸ªæ ‘æ ¹ï¼Œè®¾å…¶èƒ½å¤Ÿç®¡è¾–çš„èŒƒå›´ä¸º $[l,r]$ ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆæœ€ååŒºé—´ $[i\ge l,j\le r]$ ä¸­çš„æ•°çš„å¤§å°ä¸è¶…è¿‡æ ‘æ ¹å¤§å°çš„æ¦‚ç‡å¯ä»¥ $dp$ å‡ºæ¥ï¼Œè®¾ $f_{T,i,j}$ è¡¨ç¤ºåœ¨ä¸Šç•Œ $x$ ç¡®å®šåï¼Œåœ¨ç»è¿‡ $T$ è½®æ“ä½œååŒºé—´ $[i,j]$ çš„ç­”æ¡ˆä¸è¶…è¿‡ $x$ çš„æ¦‚ç‡ï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªç›´æ¥å‰ç¼€å’Œä¼˜åŒ–è½¬ç§»å³å¯ï¼Œç”±äºæ•°æ®éšæœºï¼Œç¬›å¡å°”æ ‘é«˜å¯ä»¥è§†ä¸º $log$ çš„ï¼Œè¿™æ ·å¤æ‚åº¦å°±æ˜¯å¯¹çš„ CODE 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081828384858687888990919293949596979899100101102103104105106107108109110111112113114115116117118119120121122123124125126127#include<bits/stdc++.h>#define ri register int#define csi const int&#define fi first#define se second#define pb push_backusing namespace std;const int rlen=1<<18|1;char buf[rlen],*ib=buf,*ob=buf;#define gc() (((ib==ob)&&(ob=(ib=buf)+fread(buf,1,rlen,stdin)),ib==ob)?-1:*ib++)typedef long long ll;typedef pair<int,int> pii;typedef vector<int> vi;typedef vector<vector<int> > vii;inline int read(){ int ans=0; Add(transum,mul(f[cur^1][a][b],a-1)); } } for(ri a=r;a>=l;--a){ transum=0; for(ri b=r;b>=a;--b){ Add(f[cur][a][b],transum); Add(transum,mul(f[cur^1][a][b],n-b)); } } } for(ri b=l;b<=r;++b){ transum=0; return ans;}inline int Read(char*s){ int top=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isalpha(ch))ch=gc(); while(isalpha(ch))s[++top]=ch,ch=gc(); return top;}namespace modular{ const int mod=1e9+7; inline int add(int a,int b){return (a+=b)<mod?a:a-mod;} inline int dec(int a,int b){return (a-=b)<0?a+mod:a;} inline int mul(int a,int b){return (ll)a*b%mod;} inline void Add(int&a,int b){a=add(a,b);} inline void Dec(int&a,int b){a=dec(a,b);} inline void Mul(int&a,int b){a=(ll)a*b%mod;} inline int ksm(int a,int p){int ret=1;for(;p;p>>=1,Mul(a,a))(p&1)&&(Mul(ret,a),1);return ret;} inline int Inv(int x){return ksm(x,mod-2);} inline void fix(int&x){x=(x%mod+mod)%mod;}}using namespace modular;template<typename T>inline void ckmin(T&a,const T&b){a>b?a=b:0;}template<typename T>inline void ckmax(T&a,const T&b){a<b?a=b:0;}const int N=2e5+5;map<ll,ll>f;int n;ll x,num,vl;int main(){ #ifdef ldxcaicai freopen("lx.in","r",stdin); } } ll res=0; for(map<ll,ll>::iterator it=f.begin();it!=f.end();++it) res=max(res,it->fi*n+it->se); cout<<res; return 0;}

Add(g[s2],cg); return; } if(lm-ps<0||lm-ps+1>m)return update(ps+1,s1,s2,trans0); if(getsta(s1,ps))return update(ps+1,s1,s2,trans1); if(lm-ps+1==m||getsta(s2,ps)){ if(ps==n)update(ps+1,s1,s2,trans1); else update(ps+1,s1|sub(ps),s2|sub(ps+1),trans2); } else{ if(ps==n)update(ps+1,s1|sub(ps),s2|sub(ps),trans2); else{ update(ps+1,s1|sub(ps),s2|sub(ps),trans3); update(ps+1,s1|sub(ps),s2|sub(ps+1),trans3); } }}#undef sub#undef trans0#undef trans1#undef trans2#undef getstainline int solve(){ vii f(n+m+1),g(n+m+1); } return g[n+m][0];}class BearDestroys{ public: inline int sumUp(int n_,int m_,int mod_){ mod=mod_,n=n_,m=m_; return solve(); }}; Cé¢˜æ„ç®€è¿°ï¼š æœ‰ $n$ ç§ä¸åŒçš„æœæ±ï¼Œç¬¬ $i$ ç§æœ‰ $c_i$ å‡ã€‚ç°åœ¨è¦å°†æ‰€æœ‰æœæ±æ”¾è¿› $m$ ä¸ªç“¶å­é‡Œï¼Œæ»¡è¶³æ¯ä¸ªç“¶å­é‡Œä¸è¶…è¿‡ä¸¤ç§æœæ±ä¸”æ‰€æœ‰ç“¶å­è£…çš„æœæ±é‡ä¸€æ ·ï¼Œé—® $m$ æœ€å°å€¼ï¼Œ(æœæ±é‡å…è®¸ä¸ºåˆ†æ•° æ•°æ®èŒƒå›´ï¼š $n\le20$ $c_i\le10^9$ è§£é¢˜æ€è·¯ï¼š å…ˆè€ƒè™‘ç­”æ¡ˆçš„ä¸Šç•Œï¼Œå®¹æ˜“å‘ç°æ˜¯ $n-1$ ï¼Œï¼ˆå¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡å½’çº³æ³•è¯æ˜ä¸€å®šå­˜åœ¨ $n-1$ ä¸ªç“¶å­çš„åˆæ³•æ–¹æ¡ˆ)ï¼Œç„¶åå‡è®¾ç°åœ¨ä¸€ä¸ªç“¶å­ä¸­æœ‰ä¸¤ç§æœæ± $a,b$ ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬åœ¨ $a,b$ ä¸­è¿ä¸Šä¸€æ¡è¾¹ï¼Œå‡è®¾ç­”æ¡ˆä¸º $m$ ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆä¸€å®šä¼šå°† $n$ ä¸ªç‚¹åˆ†æˆè‡³å°‘ $n-m$ ä¸ªè¿é€šå—ï¼Œè¿™æ ·ç›¸å½“äºå¯ä»¥æšä¸¾ $m$ ç„¶åé€’å½’æˆå­é—®é¢˜ï¼Œå¯¹äºä¸€ä¸ª $nâ€™$ ä¸ªç‚¹çš„ç‚¹é›†å¦‚æœå…¶å¯ä»¥è¢«åˆ†åˆ° $nâ€™-1$ ä¸ªç“¶å­é‡Œé‚£ä¹ˆå°±æ˜¯åˆæ³•çš„ï¼Œäºæ˜¯å°±èƒ½å¤Ÿæšä¸¾å­é›†è½¬ç§»ï¼Œå¤æ‚åº¦$O(3^n*n)$ ï¼Œå½“ç„¶å¯ä»¥ç”¨å­é›†å·ç§¯ç»§ç»­ä¼˜åŒ–ä½†æ˜¯ç”±äºæ•°æ®ä¸å¼ºå› æ­¤æ‡’å¾—å†™äº†~ CODE 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081828384858687888990#include<bits/stdc++.h>#define ri register int#define fi first#define se second#define pb push_backusing namespace std;const int rlen=1<<18|1;char buf[rlen],*ib=buf,*ob=buf;#define gc() (((ib==ob)&&(ob=(ib=buf)+fread(buf,1,rlen,stdin)),ib==ob)?-1:*ib++)typedef long long ll;typedef pair<int,int> pii;typedef vector<int> vi;typedef vector<vector<int> > vii;inline int read(){ int ans=0; las=pre[ps][las.fi][las.se]; --ps; } cout<<res<<'
'; for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i)cout<<col[i]<<' '; return 0;} Eå…ˆæŠŠæ•°ç»„æ’åºï¼Œç„¶åå¤„ç†ä¸€ä¸‹å‰åç¼€å°±èƒ½ä¸ŠåŒæŒ‡é’ˆäº† CODE 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061626364656667686970717273747576777879#include<bits/stdc++.h>#define ri register int#define pb push_back#define fi first#define se secondusing namespace std;const int rlen=1<<18|1;char buf[rlen],*ib=buf,*ob=buf;#define gc() (((ib==ob)&&(ob=(ib=buf)+fread(buf,1,rlen,stdin)),ib==ob)?-1:*ib++)typedef long long ll;typedef pair<int,int> pii;typedef vector<int> poly;inline int read(){ int ans=0; return ans;}inline int Read(char*s){ int top=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch))ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch))s[++top]=ch,ch=gc(); return top;}namespace modular{ const int mod=998244353; inline int add(int a,int b){return (a+=b)<mod?a:a-mod;} inline void Add(int&a,int b){a=add(a,b);} inline int dec(int a,int b){return (a-=b)<0?a+mod:a;} inline void Dec(int&a,int b){a=dec(a,b);} inline int mul(int a,int b){return (ll)a*b%mod;} inline void Mul(int&a,int b){a=(ll)a*b%mod;} inline int ksm(int a,int p){int ret=1;for(;p;p>>=1,Mul(a,a))(p&1)&&(Mul(ret,a),1);return ret;}}using namespace modular;const int N=100005;int n,a[N],b[N],sig,pre[N],suf[N];ll Pre[N],Suf[N],pvl[N],svl[N];ll K;int main(){ #ifdef ldxcaicai freopen("lx.in","r",stdin); #endif n=read(); K=readl(); for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i)a[i]=read(); sort(a+1,a+n+1); sig=0; for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i){ if(a[i]!=a[i-1])a[++sig]=a[i],b[sig]=1; else ++b[sig]; } for(ri i=1;i<=sig;++i)pre[i]=pre[i-1]+b[i],Pre[i]=Pre[i-1]+(ll)b[i]*a[i],pvl[i]=(ll)pre[i]*a[i]-Pre[i]; for(ri i=sig;i;--i)suf[i]=suf[i+1]+b[i],Suf[i]=Suf[i+1]+(ll)b[i]*a[i],svl[i]=(ll)Suf[i]-(ll)suf[i]*a[i]; ll res=a[sig]-a[1]; for(ri ps1=1,ps2=1;ps1<=sig;++ps1){ while(ps2<=sig&&pvl[ps1]+svl[ps2]>K)++ps2; if(ps2>sig)break; if(ps1>=ps2)return puts("0"),0; res=min(res,a[ps2]-a[ps1]-(K-pvl[ps1]-svl[ps2])/suf[ps2]); } for(ri ps1=sig,ps2=sig;ps2;--ps2){ while(ps1&&pvl[ps1]+svl[ps2]>K)--ps1; if(!ps1)break; if(ps1>=ps2)return puts("0"),0; res=min(res,a[ps2]-a[ps1]-(K-pvl[ps1]-svl[ps2])/pre[ps1]); } cout<<res; return 0;} Féšä¾¿æ‰¾ä¸ªè§„å¾‹å°±è¡Œäº†ï¼Œç„¶ååˆ†å¥‡å¶è®¨è®ºä¸€ä¸‹ CODE 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081828384858687888990919293949596979899100101102103104105106107108109#include<bits/stdc++.h>#define ri register int#define pb push_back#define fi first#define se secondusing namespace std;const int rlen=1<<18|1;char buf[rlen],*ib=buf,*ob=buf;#define gc() (((ib==ob)&&(ob=(ib=buf)+fread(buf,1,rlen,stdin)),ib==ob)?-1:*ib++)typedef long long ll;typedef pair<int,int> pii;typedef vector<int> poly;inline int read(){ int ans=0; return ans;}inline int Read(char*s){ int top=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isalpha(ch))ch=gc(); while(isalpha(ch))s[++top]=ch,ch=gc(); return top;}namespace modular{ const int mod=998244353; inline int add(int a,int b){return (a+=b)<mod?a:a-mod;} inline void Add(int&a,int b){a=add(a,b);} inline int dec(int a,int b){return (a-=b)<0?a+mod:a;} inline void Dec(int&a,int b){a=dec(a,b);} inline int mul(int a,int b){return (ll)a*b%mod;} inline void Mul(int&a,int b){a=(ll)a*b%mod;} inline int ksm(int a,int p){int ret=1;for(;p;p>>=1,Mul(a,a))(p&1)&&(Mul(ret,a),1);return ret;}}using namespace modular;const int N=6e5+5;int n,k;char s[N];inline void check1(){ if(n&1)return; for(ri i=2;i<=n;++i)if(s[i]==s[i-1])return; k&=1; for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i){ if(k==1){ if(s[i]=='W')cout<<'B'; else cout<<'W'; } else cout<<s[i]; } exit(0);}inline void check2(){ for(ri i=2;i<=n;++i)if(s[i]!=s[i-1])return; for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i)cout<<s[i]; exit(0);}bool ban[N];char res[N];int main(){ #ifdef ldxcaicai freopen("lx.in","r",stdin); #endif n=read(),k=read(); Read(s); check1(); check2(); for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i)s[i+n]=s[i+n*2]=s[i]; int st; for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i){ if(s[i]==s[i+1]){ st=i; break; } } int mid,L=st,R=st+n-1,l,r; for(l=L;l<=R;l=r+1){ r=l; while(r<R&&s[r+1]==s[r])++r; if(r==R)break; mid=r; while(r<=R&&s[r+1]!=s[r])++r; --r; if(mid==r)continue; if(r-mid<=k*2)for(ri p1=mid+1,p2=r;p1<=p2;++p1,--p2){ s[p1]=s[l],s[p2]=s[r+1]; } else{ int p1,p2,i; for(p1=mid+1,p2=r,i=1;i<=k;++i,++p1,--p2){ s[p1]=s[l],s[p2]=s[r+1]; } if(k&1)for(ri i=p1;i<=p2;++i)s[i]=s[i]=='B'?'W':'B'; } } for(ri i=L;i<=R;++i){ if(i>n)s[i-n]=s[i]; } for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i)cout<<s[i]; return 0;} Géšä¾¿è´ªä¸ªå¿ƒå°±è¿‡äº†ï¼Œè¯æ˜å¾ˆç®€å•ï¼ˆè™½ç„¶æˆ‘ç›´æ¥çè´ªçš„ä½†åæ¥ $cyktxdy$ è·Ÿæˆ‘è¯´äº†ä¸€ä¸ªè¯æ˜æ–¹æ³•æ„Ÿè§‰è¿˜æŒº $naiive$ çš„ CODE 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081828384858687888990919293949596979899100101102103104105#include<bits/stdc++.h>#define ri register int#define pb push_back#define fi first#define se secondusing namespace std;const int rlen=1<<18|1;char buf[rlen],*ib=buf,*ob=buf;#define gc() (((ib==ob)&&(ob=(ib=buf)+fread(buf,1,rlen,stdin)),ib==ob)?-1:*ib++)typedef long long ll;typedef pair<int,int> pii;typedef vector<int> poly;inline int read(){ int ans=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch))ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch))ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return ans;}inline ll readl(){ ll ans=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch))ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch))ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return ans;}inline int Read(char*s){ int top=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isalpha(ch))ch=gc(); while(isalpha(ch))s[++top]=ch,ch=gc(); return top;}namespace modular{ const int mod=998244353; inline int add(int a,int b){return (a+=b)<mod?a:a-mod;} inline void Add(int&a,int b){a=add(a,b);} inline int dec(int a,int b){return (a-=b)<0?a+mod:a;} inline void Dec(int&a,int b){a=dec(a,b);} inline int mul(int a,int b){return (ll)a*b%mod;} inline void Mul(int&a,int b){a=(ll)a*b%mod;} inline int ksm(int a,int p){int ret=1;for(;p;p>>=1,Mul(a,a))(p&1)&&(Mul(ret,a),1);return ret;}}using namespace modular;const int N=1e6+5;int n;ll K;#define lc (p<<1)#define rc (p<<1|1)#define mid (l+r>>1)int siz[N<<2];inline void build(int p,int l,int r){ siz[p]=r-l+1; if(l==r)return; build(lc,l,mid),build(rc,mid+1,r);}inline int query(int p,int l,int r){ if(!siz[p])return -1; if(l==r)return l; return siz[lc]?query(lc,l,mid):query(rc,mid+1,r);}inline void update(int p,int l,int r,int k){ if(l==r){ siz[p]=0; return; } k<=mid?update(lc,l,mid,k):update(rc,mid+1,r,k); siz[p]=siz[lc]+siz[rc];}inline int query(int p,int l,int r,int ql,int qr){ if(ql<=l&&r<=qr)return query(p,l,r); if(qr<=mid)return query(lc,l,mid,ql,qr); if(ql>mid)return query(rc,mid+1,r,ql,qr); int res=query(lc,l,mid,ql,qr); if(~res)return res; return query(rc,mid+1,r,ql,qr); }#undef lc#undef rc#undef midint ans[N];int main(){ #ifdef ldxcaicai freopen("lx.in","r",stdin); #endif n=read(); K=readl(); ll ss=0; if(K<(ll)n*(n+1)/2)return puts("-1"),0; ll T=K; K-=(ll)n*(n+1)/2; build(1,1,n); for(ri i=n;i;--i){ int ql=max(1ll,i-K),qr=i; int x=query(1,1,n,ql,qr); if(~x)ans[x]=i,K-=i-x; else ans[x=query(1,1,n,qr+1,n)]=i; update(1,1,n,x); } cout<<T-K<<'
'; for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i)cout<<i<<' '; puts(""); for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i)cout<<ans[i]<<' '; return 0;}

Aå®¹æ˜“å‘ç°åŸé¢˜ä¸­çš„è¿ç®—å¯ä»¥ç”¨çŸ©é˜µå®Œæˆ $O(n)$ ç»´æŠ¤çŸ©é˜µå’Œé€†çŸ©é˜µå³å¯ CODE 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061626364656667686970717273747576777879808182838485868788899091929394959697#include<bits/stdc++.h>#define ri register int#define fi first#define se second#define pb push_backusing namespace std;typedef long long ll;typedef pair<int,int> pii;const int rlen=1<<18|1;char buf[rlen],*ib=buf,*ob=buf;#define gc() (((ib==ob)&&(ob=(ib=buf)+fread(buf,1,rlen,stdin)),ib==ob)?-1:*ib++)inline int read(){ int ans=0; bool f=1; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch))f^=ch=='-',ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch))ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return f?ans:-ans;}inline ll readl(){ ll ans=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch))ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch))ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return ans;}inline int Read(char*s){ int top=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isalpha(ch))ch=gc(); while(isalpha(ch))s[++top]=ch; return top;}namespace modular{ const int mod=998244353; inline int add(int a,int b){return (a+=b)<mod?a:a-mod;} inline int dec(int a,int b){return (a-=b)<0?a+mod:a;} inline int mul(int a,int b){return (ll)a*b%mod;} inline void Add(int&a,int b){a=add(a,b);} inline void Dec(int&a,int b){a=dec(a,b);} inline void Mul(int&a,int b){a=(ll)a*b%mod;} inline int ksm(int a,int p){int ret=1;for(;p;p>>=1,Mul(a,a))(p&1)&&(Mul(ret,a),1);return ret;} inline int findInv(int a){return ksm(a,mod-2);}}using namespace modular;const int N=1e6+5;vector<int>e[N];struct Mat{ int a[2][2]; inline int*operator[](const int&k){return a[k];} Mat(){a[0][0]=a[0][1]=a[1][0]=a[1][1]=0;} Mat(int x,int typ){ typ==0? (a[0][0]=x,a[0][1]=1,a[1][0]=1,a[1][1]=0): (a[0][0]=0,a[0][1]=1,a[1][0]=1,a[1][1]=x?mod-x:0); } friend inline Mat operator+(Mat a,Mat b){ Mat ret; ret[0][0]=((ll)a[0][0]*b[0][0]+(ll)a[0][1]*b[1][0])%mod; ret[0][1]=((ll)a[0][0]*b[0][1]+(ll)a[0][1]*b[1][1])%mod; ret[1][0]=((ll)a[1][0]*b[0][0]+(ll)a[1][1]*b[1][0])%mod; ret[1][1]=((ll)a[1][0]*b[0][1]+(ll)a[1][1]*b[1][1])%mod; return ret; }}pre[N][2];int n,m,opt,a[N];int main(){ #ifdef ldxcaicai freopen("lx.in","r",stdin); #endif n=read(),m=read(),opt=read(); for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i)a[i]=read(); pre[0][0]=Mat(0,0),pre[0][1]=Mat(0,1); for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i){ pre[i][0]=pre[i-1][0]+Mat(a[i],0); pre[i][1]=Mat(a[i],1)+pre[i-1][1]; } for(ri ansx=0,ansy=0,op,l,r,i=1;i<=m;++i){ op=read(); if(op==1){ a[++n]=read()^ansx^ansy; pre[n][0]=pre[n-1][0]+Mat(a[n],0); pre[n][1]=Mat(a[n],1)+pre[n-1][1]; } else{ l=read()^ansx^ansy,r=read()^ansx^ansy; Mat coe=pre[l-1][1]+pre[r-1][0]; ansx=((ll)coe[0][0]*a[r]+coe[0][1])%mod; cout<<ansx<<' '; ansy=((ll)coe[1][0]*a[r]+coe[1][1])%mod; cout<<ansy<<'
'; } ansx*=opt; ansy*=opt; } return 0;} Bå®¹æ˜“æƒ³åˆ°è´¹ç”¨æµåšæ³•ï¼Œç„¶åå‘ç°å¯ä»¥ç”¨ $HLD$ +è´ªå¿ƒæ¨¡æ‹Ÿè´¹ç”¨æµæ¥è§£å†³æ‰å…ˆå‡ºç°æ‰€æœ‰é‡‘çŸ¿çš„æ•°æ®ç‚¹ ä¸‹é¢å°†é‡‘çŸ¿æˆä¸ºæ´ï¼ŒçŸ¿å·¥ç§°ä¸ºè€é¼  è€ƒè™‘ç”¨çº¿æ®µæ ‘åˆ†æ²»æ¥å°†é—®é¢˜è½¬åŒ–æˆä¸Šè¿°æƒ…å†µï¼Œè€ƒè™‘å¯¹æ¯ä¸ªæ´å»ºä¸€ä¸ªè™šçš„è€é¼ è¿›è¡ŒåŒ¹é…ï¼Œä½¿å¾—ä»£ä»·å’Œä¸ºä¸€ä¸ªç¡®å®šçš„æå¤§å€¼ $inf$ ï¼Œç„¶åç»™åŸæœ¬æ”¾æ´çš„åœ°æ–¹å»ºä¸€ä¸ªè™šå„¿å­ $x$ ï¼Œå°†è¿™ä¸ªæ´å’Œè€é¼ éƒ½æ”¾å…¥ $x$ å³å¯ï¼Œæ­£ç¡®æ€§æ˜¾ç„¶ ç„¶åå°† $HLD$ +çº¿æ®µæ ‘æ¢æˆå…¨å±€å¹³è¡¡äºŒå‰æ ‘å³å¯ï¼Œå¤æ‚åº¦ $O(n\log^2 n)$ ç„¶åæˆ‘å’Œcykä¸¤ä¸ªäººä¸€èµ·å¡å¸¸æ•°å¡äº†ä¸€ä¸‹åˆæ²¡å¡è¿‡å»ï¼Œåªèƒ½ $96pts$ æ»šäº†ï¼Œæå‡ºè¿™ä¸ªç®—æ³•çš„ç”¨æˆ·hychycçš„acä»£ç è²Œä¼¼æ”¾å®½äº†æ—¶é™æ‰è¿‡æ‰äº†æœ€åä¸€ä¸ªç‚¹ï¼Œæˆ‘æœ¬åœ°æµ‹äº†ä¸€ä¸‹ä»–æœ€åä¸€ä¸ªç‚¹æ¯”æˆ‘æ…¢7s ç•™ä¸ªé“¾åˆ†æ²»çš„å‘ä»¥åæ¥å¡«å§ 96ptsCODE #include<bits/stdc++.h>#define ri register int#define pb push_back#define fi first#define se secondusing namespace std;const int rlen=1<<18|1;char buf[rlen],*ib=buf,*ob=buf;#define gc() (((ib==ob)&&(ob=(ib=buf)+fread(buf,1,rlen,stdin)),ib==ob)?-1:*ib++)typedef long long ll;typedef pair<int,int> pii;typedef vector<int> poly;inline int read(){ int ans=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch))ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch))ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return ans;}inline ll readl(){ ll ans=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch))ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch))ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return ans;}inline int Read(char*s){ int top=0; char ch=gc(); while(!isalpha(ch))ch=gc(); while(isalpha(ch))s[++top]=ch,ch=gc(); return top;}namespace modular{ const int mod=998244353; inline int add(int a,int b){return (a+=b)<mod?a:a-mod;} inline void Add(int&a,int b){a=add(a,b);} inline int dec(int a,int b){return (a-=b)<0?a+mod:a;} inline void Dec(int&a,int b){a=dec(a,b);} inline int mul(int a,int b){return (ll)a*b%mod;} inline void Mul(int&a,int b){a=(ll)a*b%mod;} inline int ksm(int a,int p){int ret=1;for(;p;p>>=1,Mul(a,a))(p&1)&&(Mul(ret,a),1);return ret;}}using namespace modular;const int N=2e5+5;int n,m,dist[N];vector<pii>e[N];int siz[N],dep[N],dis[N],fa[N],top[N],bot[N],num[N],hson[N],pred[N],tot=0;void dfs1(int p){ siz[p]=1; for(ri i=0,v;i<(int)e[p].size();++i){ v=e[p][i].fi,fa[v]=p; dis[v]=dis[p]+e[p][i].se; dep[v]=dep[p]+1,dfs1(v); siz[p]+=siz[v]; if(siz[v]>siz[hson[p]])hson[p]=v; }}void dfs2(int p,int tp){ top[p]=tp,pred[num[p]=++tot]=p; if(!hson[p]){ bot[p]=p; return; } dfs2(hson[p],tp),bot[p]=bot[hson[p]]; for(ri i=0,v;i<(int)e[p].size();++i){ if((v=e[p][i].fi)==hson[p])continue; dfs2(v,v); }}const int inf=1e9;struct Set{ priority_queue<ll>a,b; inline void ins(int x){a.push(x);} inline void del(int x){b.push(x);} inline void pop(){while(b.size()&&a.top()==b.top())a.pop(),b.pop();a.pop();} inline int size()const{return a.size()-b.size();} inline int top(){while(b.size()&&a.top()==b.top())a.pop(),b.pop();return a.top();}}S[N];namespace sgt{ #define lc (p<<1) #define rc (p<<1|1) #define mid (l+r>>1) int M; pii mx[1<<20|5]; inline void build(int n){ for(M=1;M<=n+1;M<<=1); for(ri i=1;i<=M*2-1;++i)mx[i]=pii(-inf,-inf); for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i)mx[i+M]=pii(-inf,pred[i]); for(ri p=M-1;p;--p)mx[p]=max(mx[lc],mx[rc]); cerr<<mx[1].fi<<' '<<mx[1].se<<'
'; } inline void update(int p,int vl){ mx[p+=M].fi=vl; for(p>>=1;p;p>>=1)mx[p]=max(mx[lc],mx[rc]); } inline pii query(int l,int r){ pii res=mx[l+M]; for(l+=M-1,r+=M+1;l^r^1;l>>=1,r>>=1){ if(l&1^1)res=max(res,mx[l^1]); if(r&1)res=max(res,mx[r^1]); } if(!res.se){ cerr<<res.fi<<'
'; } return res; } #undef lc #undef rc #undef mid}//namespace sgt{// #define lc (p<<1)// #define rc (p<<1|1)// #define mid (l+r>>1)// pli mx[N<<2];// inline void build(int p,int l,int r){// if(l==r){// mx[p]=pli(-inf,pred[l]);// return;// }// build(lc,l,mid),build(rc,mid+1,r);// mx[p]=max(mx[lc],mx[rc]);// }// inline void update(int p,int l,int r,int k,ll vl){// if(l==r){// mx[p].fi=vl;// return;// }// k<=mid?update(lc,l,mid,k,vl):update(rc,mid+1,r,k,vl);// mx[p]=max(mx[lc],mx[rc]);// }// inline pli query(int p,int l,int r,int ql,int qr){// if(ql<=l&&r<=qr)return mx[p];// if(qr<=mid)return query(lc,l,mid,ql,qr);// if(ql>mid)return query(rc,mid+1,r,ql,qr);// return max(query(lc,l,mid,ql,qr),query(rc,mid+1,r,ql,qr));// }// #undef lc// #undef rc// #undef mid//}inline pii operator+(pii a,pii b){ if(a.fi!=b.fi)return min(a,b); return dep[a.se]>dep[b.se]?a:b;}namespace bst{ #define lc (son[p][0]) #define rc (son[p][1]) int ft[N],tg[N<<2],son[N][2]; pii vl[N<<2],mn[N<<2]; inline void pushup(int p){ if(lc&&rc)mn[p]=mn[lc]+vl[p]+mn[rc]; else if(lc)mn[p]=mn[lc]+vl[p]; else if(rc)mn[p]=vl[p]+mn[rc]; else mn[p]=vl[p]; } inline bool isroot(int x){return !ft[x]||(son[ft[x]][0]!=x&&son[ft[x]][1]!=x);} inline void pushnow(int x,int v){vl[x].fi+=v,mn[x].fi+=v,tg[x]+=v;} inline void pushdown(int p){ if(tg[p]){ if(lc)pushnow(lc,tg[p]); if(rc)pushnow(rc,tg[p]); tg[p]=0; } } inline int build(int l,int r,int dt=0){ if(l>r)return 0; if(l==r)return pred[l]; for(ri p,i=r;i>=l;--i){ if(siz[pred[i]]*2>=siz[pred[l]]+dt){ p=pred[i]; lc=build(l,i-1,siz[p]); rc=build(i+1,r,dt); ft[lc]=ft[rc]=p; pushup(p); return p; } } } inline int build(int p){ for(ri x=p;x;x=hson[x]){ vl[x]=mn[x]=pii(0,x); for(ri i=0,v;i<(int)e[x].size();++i) if((v=e[x][i].fi)!=hson[x])ft[build(v)]=x; } return build(num[p],num[bot[p]]); } int Stk[N],Tp; inline void update(int p,int v){ while(p){ Stk[Tp=1]=p; for(ri x=p;!isroot(x);x=ft[x])Stk[++Tp]=ft[x]; while(Tp)pushdown(Stk[Tp--]); vl[p].fi+=v; if(lc)pushnow(lc,v); pushup(p); while(!isroot(p)){ if(son[ft[p]][1]==p){ vl[ft[p]].fi+=v; if(son[ft[p]][0])pushnow(son[ft[p]][0],v); } p=ft[p]; pushup(p); } p=ft[p]; } } inline pii query(int p){ pii res=pii(inf,0); while(p){ Stk[Tp=1]=p; for(ri x=p;!isroot(x);x=ft[x])Stk[++Tp]=ft[x]; while(Tp)pushdown(Stk[Tp--]); res=res+vl[p]; if(lc)res=res+mn[lc]; while(!isroot(p)){ if(son[ft[p]][1]==p){ res=res+vl[ft[p]]; if(son[ft[p]][0])res=res+mn[son[ft[p]][0]]; } p=ft[p]; } p=ft[p]; } return res; } int Dep[N]; inline int querydep(int x){ if(!ft[x])return Dep[x]=1; if(Dep[x])return Dep[x]; return Dep[x]=querydep(ft[x])+1; } #undef lc #undef rc}int rt,suf[N];struct Qry{int op,id,vl;}qry[N];bool vs[N];#define lc (p<<1)#define rc (p<<1|1)#define mid (l+r>>1)vector<pii>upd[N<<2];inline void update(int p,int l,int r,int ql,int qr,pii v){ if(ql<=l&&r<=qr)return upd[p].pb(v); if(qr<=mid)update(lc,l,mid,ql,qr,v); else if(ql>mid)update(rc,mid+1,r,ql,qr,v); else update(lc,l,mid,ql,qr,v),update(rc,mid+1,r,ql,qr,v);}ll ss=0,curss;struct node{ int op,id,vl; node(){op=id=vl=0;} node(int op,int id,ll vl):op(op),id(id),vl(vl){}};vector<node>stk;inline void change(pii F){ pii tp=bst::query(F.se); int p=tp.fi>0?rt:tp.se; //pli tp=sgt::query(1,1,n,num[p],num[p]+siz[p]-1); tp=sgt::query(num[p],num[p]+siz[p]-1); if(tp.fi+F.fi<=0)return; ss+=tp.fi+F.fi; S[F.se].ins(-F.fi); //sgt::update(1,1,n,num[F.se],S[F.se].top()); sgt::update(num[F.se],S[F.se].top()); bst::update(F.se,-1); stk.pb(node(1,F.se,-F.fi)); stk.pb(node(3,F.se,1)); S[tp.se].del(tp.fi); //sgt::update(1,1,n,num[tp.se],S[tp.se].top()); sgt::update(num[tp.se],S[tp.se].top()); bst::update(tp.se,1); stk.pb(node(2,tp.se,tp.fi)); stk.pb(node(3,tp.se,-1));}inline void Pop(){ node t=stk.back(); stk.pop_back(); if(t.op==1){ S[t.id].del(t.vl); //sgt::update(1,1,n,num[t.id],S[t.id].top()); sgt::update(num[t.id],S[t.id].top()); } if(t.op==2){ S[t.id].ins(t.vl); //sgt::update(1,1,n,num[t.id],S[t.id].top()); sgt::update(num[t.id],S[t.id].top()); } if(t.op==3)bst::update(t.id,t.vl);}inline void solve(int p,int l,int r){ int sz=stk.size(); ll curss=ss; for(ri i=(int)upd[p].size()-1;~i;--i)change(upd[p][i]); if(l==r)cout<<ss-(ll)suf[l]*inf<<'
'; else solve(lc,l,mid),solve(rc,mid+1,r); while(stk.size()!=sz)Pop(); ss=curss;}#undef lc#undef rc#undef midsigned main(){ #ifdef ldxcaicai freopen("lx.in","r",stdin); freopen("std.out","w",stdout); #endif int tt=clock(); n=read(),m=read(); for(ri i=1,u,v,w;i<n;++i){ u=read(),v=read(),w=read(); vs[v]=1; e[u].pb(pii(v,w)); } for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i)if(!vs[i]){ rt=i; break; } for(ri i=1;i<=m;++i){ qry[i].op=read(); qry[i].id=read(); qry[i].vl=read(); if(qry[i].op==2){ ++n; e[qry[i].id].pb(pii(n,0)); qry[i].id=n; } } for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i)S[i].ins(-inf); dep[rt]=1; dfs1(rt); dfs2(rt,rt); //sgt::build(1,1,n); sgt::build(n); bst::build(rt); int mxdep=0; for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i)mxdep=max(mxdep,bst::querydep(i)); for(ri i=1;i<=m;++i){ if(qry[i].op==1){ qry[i].vl-=dis[qry[i].id]; update(1,1,m,i,m,pii(qry[i].vl,qry[i].id)); } else{ qry[i].vl+=dis[qry[i].id]; return c; } init(t); a.resize(lim),ntt(a,1); b.resize(lim),ntt(b,1); for(ri i=0;i<lim;++i)Mul(a[i],b[i]); return ntt(a,-1),a.resize(t),a;}poly f,g;const int N=1e5+5;int s[N];int n,cnt[N],fac[N],ifac[N];inline void init(){ fac[0]=fac[1]=ifac[0]=ifac[1]=1; for(ri i=2;i<=n;++i){ fac[i]=mul(fac[i-1],i); ifac[i]=mul(ifac[mod-mod/i*i],mod-mod/i); } for(ri i=2;i<=n;++i)Mul(ifac[i],ifac[i-1]); ifac[0]=0;}inline void solve(int l,int r){ if(l==r)return; int mid=l+r>>1; solve(mid+1,r);}int main(){ #ifdef ldxcaicai freopen("lx.in","r",stdin); #endif init_ntt(); n=Read(s)+1; f.resize(n+1); init(); s[0]=1,cnt[0]=0; f[0]=1; for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i)cnt[i]=cnt[i-1]+s[i]; for(ri i=0;i<=n;++i)cnt[i]=cnt[i]&1?mod-1:1; solve(0,n); cout<<mul(f[n],fac[n]); return 0;} å‘Šè¾

'; return 0;} Få¤§åˆ†ç±»è®¨è®ºï¼Œä¸çŸ¥é“ä¸ºå•¥æˆ‘å†™çš„é‚£ä¹ˆéº»çƒ¦=.=ï¼Œçœ‹åˆ«äººè®¨è®ºçš„å¥½åƒå¾ˆç®€å•ï¼Œç›´æ¥å»ä¸–äº† æˆ‘çš„è®¨è®ºï¼š è‡ªå·±æ˜¯å¶å­ çˆ¶äº²æ˜¯æ ¹ è‡ªå·±ä¸æ˜¯å¶å­ä¸”çˆ¶äº²ä¸æ˜¯æ ¹ ä»£ç ä¸‘æ­»äº† CODE #include<bits/stdc++.h>#define ri register int#define pb push_back#define fi first#define se secondusing namespace std;const int rlen=1<<18|1;char buf[rlen],*ib=buf,*ob=buf;#define gc() (((ib==ob)&&(ob=(ib=buf)+fread(buf,1,rlen,stdin)),ib==ob)?-1:*ib++)typedef long long ll;typedef pair<int,int> pii;typedef vector<int> poly;inline int read(){ int ans=0; for(ri i=0,v;i<e[p].size();++i){ if((v=e[p][i])==ft)continue; Fa[v]=p; dfs(v,p); siz[p]+=siz[v]; } if(siz[p]*2==n)RT.pb(p),RT.pb(ft);}int ban,ad[N];bool check(int p,int ft){ if(siz[p]==1)return 1; if(p==ban){ vector<pii>tp; for(ri i=0,v;i<e[p].size();++i){ if((v=e[p][i])==ft)continue; tp.pb(pii(siz[v],v)); } sort(tp.begin(),tp.end()); if(tp[0].fi!=tp[1].fi)fail; if(tp[0].fi+tp[1].fi+1!=tp[2].fi)fail; return check(tp[0].se,p)&&check(tp[1].se,p)&&check(tp[2].se,p); } else{ int son1=0,son2=0; for(ri i=0,v;i<e[p].size();++i){ if((v=e[p][i])==ft)continue; if(!son1)son1=v; else son2=v; } if(!son2)return 0; if(siz[son1]+ad[son1]!=siz[son2]+ad[son2])return 0; return check(son1,p)&&check(son2,p); }}bool checkk(int p,int ft){ if(siz[p]==1)return 1; if(p==ban){ vector<pii>tp; for(ri i=0,v;i<e[p].size();++i){ if((v=e[p][i])==ft)continue; tp.pb(pii(siz[v],v)); } return tp[0].fi==1; } else{ int son1=0,son2=0; for(ri i=0,v;i<e[p].size();++i){ if((v=e[p][i])==ft)continue; if(!son1)son1=v; else son2=v; } if(!son2)return 0; if(siz[son1]+ad[son1]!=siz[son2]+ad[son2])return 0; return checkk(son1,p)&&checkk(son2,p); }}void dfss(int p,int ft){ siz[p]=1; int son1=0,son2=0; for(ri i=0,v;i<e[p].size();++i){ if((v=e[p][i])==ft)continue; if(!son1)son1=v; else son2=v; dfss(v,p),siz[p]+=siz[v]; } if(siz[son1]!=siz[son2])fail;}int main(){ #ifdef ldxcaicai freopen("lx.in","r",stdin); '<<1<<' '<<2,0; for(ri i=1,u,v;i<n;++i){ u=read(),v=read(); e[u].pb(v); e[v].pb(u); } int ct1=0,ct2=0,ct3=0; for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i){ if(e[i].size()>4)fail; if(e[i].size()==4)++ct1; if(e[i].size()==2)++ct2; if(e[i].size()==3)++ct3; } if(ct1>1)fail; if(ct1==1){ if(ct2!=1)fail; int ps; for(ps=1;ps<=n;++ps)if(e[ps].size()==2)break; for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i)if(e[i].size()==4)ban=i; dfs(ps,0); int tp=ban; while(tp!=ps){ ad[tp]=1; tp=Fa[tp]; } if(!check(ps,0))fail; cout<<1<<'
'; cout<<ban; return 0; } if(ct2&&ct2!=2)fail; if(ct2==2){ int a=0,b=0; for(ri i=1;i<=n;++i)if(e[i].size()==2){ if(!a)a=i; else b=i; } dfs(a,0); ban=b; while(ban!=a){ ad[ban]=1; ban=Fa[ban]; } ban=b; if(checkk(a,0))return cout<<1<<'
'<<ban,0; while(ban!=a){ ad[ban]=0; ban=Fa[ban]; } dfs(b,0); ban=a; while(ban!=b){ ad[ban]=1; ban=Fa[ban]; } ban=a; if(checkk(b,0))return cout<<1<<'
'<<ban,0; fail; } if(!ct3)fail; dfs(1,0); if(RT.size()!=2)fail; dfss(RT[0],RT[1]),dfss(RT[1],RT[0]); cout<<2<<'
'; cout<<min(RT[0],RT[1])<<' '<<max(RT[0],RT[1]); return 0;}

char ch=gc(); while(!isdigit(ch))ch=gc(); while(isdigit(ch))ans=((ans<<2)+ans<<1)+(ch^48),ch=gc(); return ans;}namespace modular{ int mod=1e9+7; inline int add(int a,int b){return (a+=b)<mod?a:a-mod;} inline void Add(int&a,int b){a=add(a,b);} inline int dec(int a,int b){return (a-=b)<0?a+mod:a;} inline void Dec(int&a,int b){a=dec(a,b);} inline int mul(int a,int b){return (ll)a*b%mod;} inline void Mul(int&a,int b){a=(ll)a*b%mod;} inline int ksm(int a,int p){int ret=1;for(;p;p>>=1,Mul(a,a))(p&1)&&(Mul(ret,a),1);return ret;}}using namespace modular;const int N=105;int n,m,L,f[N][N][N][2],C[N][N],pw[4][N];inline void init(){ for(ri i=0,up=max(n,m);i<=up;++i){ C[i][0]=1; for(ri t=0;b+t<=m;++t,Mul(mt,mlt)) Add(f[vl+1][a][b+t][0],mul(f[vl][a][b][1],mul(mt,C[m-b][t]))); } } cout<<f[L][n][m][0]; return 0;}
